   16: 
   17: -module(muc_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -define(MUC_HOST, <<"muc.localhost">>).
   26: -define(MUC_CLIENT_HOST, <<"localhost/res1">>).
   27: -define(PASSWORD, <<"password">>).
   28: -define(SUBJECT, <<"subject">>).
   29: -define(WAIT_TIME, 1500).
   30: 
   31: -define(NS_MUC_REQUEST, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#request">>).
   32: -define(NS_MUC_ROOMCONFIG, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#roomconfig">>).
   33: 
   34: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   35:     [ct:fail("assert_equal( ~p, ~p) failed~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n",
   36:              [??E, ??V, (E), (V)])
   37:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   38:     )).
   39: 
   40: -record(rsm_in, {
   41:         max :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   42:         direction :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   43:         id :: binary() | undefined,
   44:         index ::non_neg_integer() | undefined
   45:         }).
   46: 
   47: -record(rsm_out, {
   48:         index :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   49:         count :: non_neg_integer(),
   50:         first :: binary() | undefined,
   51:         last  :: binary() | undefined,
   52:         items :: [#xmlel{}]
   53:         }).
   54: 
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: %% Suite configuration
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: 
   59: all() -> [
   60:         {group, disco},
   61:         {group, disco_rsm},
   62:         {group, moderator},
   63:         {group, admin},
   64:         {group, admin_membersonly},
   65:         {group, occupant},
   66:         {group, owner},
   67:         {group, room_management}
   68:         ].
   69: 
   70: groups() -> [
   71:         {disco, [], [
   72:                 disco_service,
   73:                 disco_features,
   74:                 disco_rooms,
   75:                 disco_info,
   76:                 disco_items,
   77:                 disco_items_nonpublic
   78:                 ]},
   79:         {disco_rsm, [], rsm_cases()},
   80:         {moderator, [], [
   81:                 moderator_subject,
   82:                 moderator_subject_unauthorized,
   83:                 moderator_kick,
   84:                 moderator_kick_with_reason,
   85:                 moderator_kick_unauthorized,
   86:                 moderator_voice,
   87:                 moderator_voice_with_reason,
   88:                 moderator_voice_unauthorized,
   89:                 moderator_voice_list,
   90:                 moderator_voice_approval,
   91:                 moderator_voice_forbidden,
   92:                 moderator_voice_not_occupant,
   93:                 moderator_voice_nonick
   94:                 ]},
   95:         {admin, [], [
   96:                 admin_ban,
   97:                 admin_ban_with_reason,
   98:                 admin_ban_list,
   99:                 admin_get_form,
  100:                 admin_invalid_affiliation,
  101:                 admin_invalid_jid,
  102:                 %% test should fail, temporarily changed
  103:                 admin_ban_higher_user,
  104:                 admin_membership,
  105:                 admin_membership_with_reason,
  106:                 admin_member_list,
  107:                 admin_member_list_allowed,
  108:                 admin_moderator,
  109:                 admin_moderator_with_reason,
  110:                 admin_moderator_revoke_owner,
  111:                 admin_moderator_list,
  112:                 admin_invalid_role,
  113:                 admin_invalid_nick
  114:                 ]},
  115:         {admin_membersonly, [], [
  116:                 admin_mo_revoke,
  117:                 admin_mo_invite,
  118:                 admin_mo_invite_with_reason,
  119:                 admin_mo_invite_mere
  120:                 ]},
  121:         {occupant, [], [
  122:                 %nick registration in a room is not implemented and will not be tested
  123:                 groupchat_user_enter,
  124:                 groupchat_user_enter_no_nickname,
  125:                 muc_user_enter,
  126:                 enter_non_anonymous_room,
  127:                 deny_access_to_password_protected_room,
  128:                 enter_password_protected_room,
  129:                 deny_accesss_to_memebers_only_room,
  130:                 deny_entry_to_a_banned_user,
  131:                 deny_entry_nick_conflict,
  132:                 multi_sessions_enter,
  133:                 multi_sessions_messages,
  134:                 multi_sessions_exit_session,
  135:                 multi_sessions_exit,
  136:                 deny_entry_with_multiple_sessions_disallowed,
  137:                 enter_room_with_logging,
  138:                 deny_entry_user_limit_reached,
  139:                 send_history,
  140:                 history_since,
  141: 
  142:                 %% the following tests fail and have been commented because
  143:                 %% certain features are not implemented in ejabberd
  144:                 %% send_non_anonymous_history,
  145:                 %% limit_history_chars,
  146:                 %% limit_history_messages,
  147:                 %% recent_history, %unfinished,
  148:                 %% no_history,
  149: 
  150:                 subject,
  151:                 no_subject,
  152:                 send_to_all,
  153:                 send_and_receive_private_message,
  154:                 send_private_groupchat,
  155:                 change_nickname,
  156:                 deny_nickname_change_conflict,
  157:                 change_availability_status,
  158:                 mediated_invite,
  159:                 one2one_chat_to_muc,
  160:                 exit_room,
  161:                 exit_room_with_status
  162:                 ]},
  163:         {owner, [], [
  164:                 room_creation_not_allowed,
  165:                 %% fails, see testcase
  166:                 cant_enter_locked_room,
  167:                 create_instant_room,
  168:                 destroy_locked_room,
  169:                 create_reserved_room,
  170:                 %% fails, see testcase
  171:                 reserved_room_cancel,
  172:                 reserved_room_unacceptable,
  173:                 reserved_room_configuration,
  174:                 owner_grant_revoke,
  175:                 owner_grant_revoke_with_reason,
  176:                 owner_list,
  177:                 owner_unauthorized,
  178:                 admin_grant_revoke,
  179:                 admin_grant_revoke_with_reason,
  180:                 admin_list,
  181:                 admin_unauthorized,
  182:                 destroy,
  183:                 destroy_unauthorized,
  184:                 config_denial,
  185:                 config_cancel,
  186:                 configure,
  187:                 configure_logging,
  188:                 %% fails, see testcase
  189:                 configure_anonymous
  190:                 ]},
  191:         {room_management, [], [
  192:                 create_and_destroy_room,
  193:                 create_and_destroy_room_multiple_x_elements
  194:                 ]}
  195:         ].
  196: 
  197: rsm_cases() ->
  198:       [pagination_first5,
  199:        pagination_last5,
  200:        pagination_before10,
  201:        pagination_after10,
  202:        pagination_empty_rset].
  203: 
  204: suite() ->
  205:     escalus:suite().
  206: 
  207: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: %% Init & teardown
  209: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  210: 
  211: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  212:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
  213: 
  214: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  215:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  216: 
  217: init_per_group(moderator, Config) ->
  218:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
  219:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
  220:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate])),
  221:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config1),
  222:     start_room(Config1, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
  223:         [{persistent, true}, {allow_change_subj, false}, {moderated, true},
  224:          {members_by_default, false}]);
  225: 
  226: init_per_group(admin, Config) ->
  227:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
  228:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
  229:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate])),
  230:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config1),
  231:     start_room(Config1, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]);
  232: 
  233: init_per_group(admin_membersonly, Config) ->
  234:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
  235:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
  236:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate])),
  237:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config1),
  238:     start_room(Config1, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true},
  239:         {members_only, true}]);
  240: 
  241: init_per_group(disco, Config) ->
  242:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
  243:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config1),
  244:     start_room(Config1, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>,
  245:         [{persistent, true}]);
  246: 
  247: init_per_group(disco_rsm, Config) ->
  248:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
  249:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config1),
  250:     start_rsm_rooms(Config1, Alice, <<"aliceonchat">>);
  251: 
  252: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  253:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate])).
  254: 
  255: end_per_group(moderator, Config) ->
  256:     destroy_room(Config),
  257:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate]));
  258: 
  259: end_per_group(admin, Config) ->
  260:     destroy_room(Config),
  261:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate]));
  262: 
  263: end_per_group(admin_membersonly, Config) ->
  264:     destroy_room(Config),
  265:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate]));
  266: 
  267: end_per_group(disco, Config) ->
  268:     destroy_room(Config),
  269:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
  270: 
  271: end_per_group(disco_rsm, Config) ->
  272:     destroy_rsm_rooms(Config),
  273:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
  274: 
  275: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  276:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, kate])).
  277: 
  278: init_per_testcase(CaseName = configure_anonymous, Config) ->
  279:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  280:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>,
  281:         [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, true}]),
  282:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  283: 
  284: init_per_testcase(CaseName = configure_logging, Config) ->
  285:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  286:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>,
  287:         [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, true}]),
  288:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  289: 
  290: init_per_testcase(CaseName = configure, Config) ->
  291:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  292:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  293:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  294: 
  295: init_per_testcase(CaseName = config_cancel, Config) ->
  296:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  297:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  298:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  299: 
  300: init_per_testcase(CaseName = config_denial, Config) ->
  301:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  302:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  303:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  304: 
  305: init_per_testcase(CaseName = destroy_unauthorized, Config) ->
  306:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  307:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  308:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  309: 
  310: init_per_testcase(CaseName = destroy, Config) ->
  311:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  312:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  313:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  314: 
  315: init_per_testcase(CaseName = admin_unauthorized, Config) ->
  316:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  317:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  318:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  319: 
  320: init_per_testcase(CaseName = admin_list, Config) ->
  321:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  322:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  323:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  324: 
  325: init_per_testcase(CaseName = admin_grant_revoke, Config) ->
  326:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  327:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  328:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  329: 
  330: init_per_testcase(CaseName = admin_grant_revoke_with_reason, Config) ->

  333:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  334: 
  335: init_per_testcase(CaseName = owner_unauthorized, Config) ->
  336:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  337:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  338:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  339: 
  340: init_per_testcase(CaseName = owner_list, Config) ->
  341:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  342:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  343:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  344: 
  345: init_per_testcase(CaseName = owner_grant_revoke, Config) ->
  346:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  347:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  348:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  349:

  352:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{persistent, true}]),
  353:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  354: 
  355: init_per_testcase(CaseName = groupchat_user_enter, Config) ->
  356:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  357:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, []),
  358:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  359: 
  360: init_per_testcase(CaseName = groupchat_user_enter_no_nickname, Config) ->
  361:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  362:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, []),
  363:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  364: 
  365: init_per_testcase(CaseName = muc_user_enter, Config) ->
  366:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  367:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, []),
  368:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  369: 
  370: init_per_testcase(CaseName = enter_non_anonymous_room, Config) ->
  371:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  372:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{anonymous, false}]),
  373:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  374: 
  375: init_per_testcase(CaseName = deny_access_to_password_protected_room, Config) ->
  376:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  377:     %{password_protected, Password}?
  378:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{password_protected, true}]),
  379:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  380: 
  381: init_per_testcase(CaseName = enter_password_protected_room, Config) ->
  382:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  383:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{password_protected, true}, {password, ?PASSWORD}]),
  384:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  385: 
  386: init_per_testcase(CaseName = deny_accesss_to_memebers_only_room, Config) ->
  387:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  388:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{members_only, true}]),
  389:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  390: 
  391: init_per_testcase(CaseName =deny_entry_to_a_banned_user, Config) ->
  392:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  393:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, []),
  394:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  395: 
  396: init_per_testcase(CaseName =deny_entry_nick_conflict, Config) ->

  398:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, []),
  399:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  400: 
  401: init_per_testcase(CaseName =multi_sessions_enter, Config) ->
  402:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  403:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{allow_multiple_sessions, true}]),
  404:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  405: 
  406: init_per_testcase(CaseName =multi_sessions_messages, Config) ->
  407:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  408:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{allow_multiple_sessions, true}]),
  409:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  410: 
  411: init_per_testcase(CaseName =multi_sessions_exit, Config) ->
  412:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  413:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{allow_multiple_sessions, true}]),
  414:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  415: 
  416: init_per_testcase(CaseName =multi_sessions_exit_session, Config) ->

  419:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  420:

  425: 
  426: init_per_testcase(CaseName =deny_entry_user_limit_reached, Config) ->

  428:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"aliceonchat">>, [{max_users, 1}]),
  429:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  430:

  435:

  440:

  445:

  460: 
  461: init_per_testcase(CaseName =history_since, Config) ->
  462:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  463:     Config1 = start_room(Config, Alice, <<"alicesroom">>, <<"alice">>, []),
  464:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config1);
  465:

  467:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),

  753: 
  754: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  755: %%  Moderator use case tests
  756: %%
  757: %%  Tests the usecases described here :
  758: %%  http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0045.html/#moderator
  759: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  760: 
  761: %%  Examples 84-85
  762: moderator_subject(Config) ->
  763:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  764:         %% Alice joins room
  765:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  766:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  767: 
  768:         %% Alice sets room subject
  769:         escalus:send(Alice,
  770:             stanza_room_subject(?config(room,Config), <<"Lets have a chat!">>)),
  771: 
  772:         %% Alice receives subject change message
  773:         Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  774:         true = is_subject_message(Message, <<"Lets have a chat!">>),
  775:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
  776:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"alice">>)], Message)
  777:     end).
  778: 
  779: %%  Example 87
  780: %%  This test doesn't fail anymore
  781: %%  According to XEP error message should be from chatroom@service/nick,
  782: %%  however ejabberd provides it from chatroom@service
  783: moderator_subject_unauthorized(Config) ->
  784:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  785:         %% Alice joins room
  786:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  787:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  788:         %% Bob joins room
  789:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  790:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  791:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  792:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  793: 
  794:         %% Alice grants voice to Bob
  795:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
  796:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"participant">>}])),
  797: 
  798:         %% skip Bob's new presence
  799:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  800: 
  801:         %% Bob tries to set the room subject
  802:         escalus:send(Bob,
  803:             stanza_room_subject(?config(room,Config), <<"Lets have a chat!">>)),
  804: 
  805:         %% Bob should receive an error
  806:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  807:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Error),
  808:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
  809:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Error)
  810:     end).
  811: 
  812: %%  Examples 89-92
  813: %%  Apparently user has to be in the room to kick someone, however XEP doesn't need that
  814: moderator_kick(Config) ->
  815:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  816:         %% Alice joins room
  817:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  818:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  819:         %% Bob joins room
  820:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  821:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  822:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  823:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  824: 
  825:         %% Alice kicks Bob
  826:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
  827:             ?config(room,Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"none">>}])),
  828: 
  829:         %% Alice receives both iq result and Bob's unavailable presence
  830:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
  831:             is_unavailable_presence(Stanza, <<"307">>) andalso
  832:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  833:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  834:         end,
  835:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred],
  836:           escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  837: 
  838:         %% Bob receives his presence
  839:         escalus:assert(Pred, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  840:     end).
  841: 
  842: moderator_kick_with_reason(Config) ->
  843:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  844:         %% Alice joins room
  845:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  846:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  847:         %% Bob joins room
  848:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  849:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  850:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  851:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  852: 
  853:         %% Alice kicks Bob
  854:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
  855:             ?config(room,Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"none">>,<<"Some serious reason">>}])),
  856: 
  857:         %% Alice receives both iq result and Bob's unavailable presence
  858:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
  859:             has_reason(Stanza) andalso
  860:             is_unavailable_presence(Stanza, <<"307">>) andalso
  861:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  862:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  863:         end,
  864:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred],
  865:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  866:         %% Bob receives his presence
  867:         Pres = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  868:         escalus:assert(Pred, Pres),
  869:         true = has_reason(Pres)
  870:     end).
  871: 
  872: %%  Example 93
  873: moderator_kick_unauthorized(Config) ->
  874:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  875:         %% Alice joins room
  876:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  877:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  878:         %% Bob joins room
  879:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  880:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  881:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  882:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  883: 
  884:         %% Bob tries to kick Alice
  885:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_set_roles(
  886:             ?config(room,Config), [{<<"alice">>,<<"none">>}])),
  887: 
  888:         %% Bob should get an error
  889:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  890:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>,<<"not-allowed">>], Error),
  891:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
  892:     end).
  893: 
  894: %%  Examples 94-101
  895: moderator_voice(Config) ->
  896:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  897:         %% Alice joins room
  898:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  899:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  900:         %% Bob joins room
  901:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  902:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  903:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  904:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  905: 
  906:         %% Alice grants voice to Bob
  907:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
  908:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"participant">>}])),
  909: 
  910:         %% Alice receives success information and new Bob's presence
  911:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
  912:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>) andalso
  913:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  914:               room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  915:         end,
  916:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred],
  917:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  918: 
  919:         %% Bob should receive his new presence
  920:         escalus:assert(Pred, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  921: 
  922:         %% Revoke Bob's voice
  923:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
  924:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"visitor">>}])),
  925: 
  926:         %% Alice receives success information and new Bob's presence
  927:         Pred2 = fun(Stanza) ->
  928:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"visitor">>) andalso
  929:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  930:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  931:         end,
  932:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred2],
  933:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  934: 
  935:         %% Bob should receive his new presence
  936:         escalus:assert(Pred2, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  937:     end).
  938: 
  939: moderator_voice_with_reason(Config) ->
  940:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  941:         %% Alice joins room
  942:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  943:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  944:         %% Bob joins room
  945:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  946:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  947:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  948:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  949: 
  950:         %% Alice grants voice to Bob
  951:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
  952:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"participant">>,<<"Lets chat!">>}])),
  953: 
  954:         %% Alice receives success information and new Bob's presence
  955:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
  956:             has_reason(Stanza) andalso
  957:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>) andalso
  958:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  959:               room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  960:         end,
  961:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred],
  962:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  963: 
  964:         %% Bob should receive his new presence
  965:         Pres = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  966:         escalus:assert(Pred, Pres),
  967:         true = has_reason(Pres),
  968: 
  969:         %% Revoke Bob's voice
  970:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
  971:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"visitor">>,<<"No, let's not">>}])),
  972: 
  973:         %% Alice receives success information and new Bob's presence
  974:         Pred2 = fun(Stanza) ->
  975:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"visitor">>) andalso
  976:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
  977:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
  978:         end,
  979:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred2],
  980:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  981: 
  982:         %% Bob should receive his new presence
  983:         Pres2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  984:         escalus:assert(Pred2, Pres2),
  985:         true = has_reason(Pres2)
  986:     end).
  987: %%  Example 102, 107
  988: moderator_voice_unauthorized(Config) ->
  989:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  990:         %% Alice joins room
  991:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
  992:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  993:         %% Bob joins room
  994:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
  995:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
  996:         %% Skip Bob's presence
  997:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  998: 
  999:         %% Bob tries to revoke voice from Alice
 1000:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_set_roles(?config(room,Config),
 1001:             [{<<"alice">>,<<"visitor">>}])),
 1002: 
 1003:         %% Bob should get an error
 1004:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1005:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Error),
 1006:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1007:     end).
 1008: 
 1009: %%  Examples 103-106
 1010: %%  ejabberd behaves strange, responds that owner doesn't have moderator privileges
 1011: %%  if she isn't in the room
 1012: moderator_voice_list(Config) ->
 1013:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1014:         %% Alice joins room
 1015:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1016:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1017:         %% Bob joins room
 1018:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1019:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1020:         %% Kate joins room
 1021:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1022:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 1023:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1024:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1025:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 1026:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 1027: 
 1028:         %% Alice requests voice list
 1029:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1030:           stanza_role_list_request(?config(room, Config), <<"participant">>)),
 1031:         List = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1032:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List),
 1033:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], List),
 1034:         %% List should be empty
 1035:         true = is_item_list_empty(List),
 1036: 
 1037:         %% Grant voice to Bob and Kate
 1038:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room, Config),
 1039:               [{<<"bob">>, <<"participant">>}, {<<"kate">>,<<"participant">>}])),
 1040: 
 1041:         %% Alice receives confirmation and Bob's and Kate's new presences
 1042:         Preds = [fun(Stanza) ->
 1043:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>) andalso
 1044:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1045:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
 1046:         end,
 1047:         fun(Stanza) ->
 1048:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>) andalso
 1049:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1050:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>), Stanza)
 1051:         end],
 1052:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result | Preds],
 1053:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3)),
 1054: 
 1055:         %% Bob and Kates get their presences
 1056:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 1057:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 2)),
 1058: 
 1059:         %% Alice requests voice list again
 1060:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1061:           stanza_role_list_request(?config(room, Config), <<"participant">>)),
 1062:         List2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1063:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List2),
 1064:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], List2),
 1065:         %% Bob and Kate should be on it
 1066:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List2, Bob),
 1067:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List2, Kate),
 1068: 
 1069:         %% Revoke Bob's and Kate's voices
 1070:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room, Config),
 1071:               [{<<"bob">>, <<"visitor">>}, {<<"kate">>,<<"visitor">>}])),
 1072: 
 1073:         %% Alice receives confirmation and Bob's and Kate's new presences
 1074:         Preds2 = [fun(Stanza) ->
 1075:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"visitor">>) andalso
 1076:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1077:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
 1078:         end,
 1079:         fun(Stanza) ->
 1080:             is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"visitor">>) andalso
 1081:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1082:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>), Stanza)
 1083:         end],
 1084:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result | Preds2],
 1085:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3)),
 1086: 
 1087:         %% Bob and Kates get their presences
 1088:         escalus:assert_many(Preds2, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 1089:         escalus:assert_many(Preds2, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 2))
 1090:     end).
 1091: 
 1092: %%  This test doesn't fail anymore, moderator used to never get voice approval form
 1093: %%  This test works, but XEP doesn't specify what error messages should be here if something goes wrong...
 1094: %%  Examples 108-109
 1095: moderator_voice_approval(Config) ->
 1096:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1097:         %% Alice joins room
 1098:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1099:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1100:         %% Bob joins room
 1101:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1102:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1103:         %% Skip Bob's presence
 1104:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1105: 
 1106:         %% Bob sends voice request
 1107:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_voice_request_form(?config(room, Config))),
 1108: 
 1109:         %% Alice should get the request
 1110:         Form = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1111:         true = is_message_form(Form),
 1112: 
 1113:         Appr = stanza_voice_request_approval(?config(room, Config),
 1114:             escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"bob">>),
 1115:         escalus:send(Alice, Appr),
 1116: 
 1117:         %% Bob should get his new presence
 1118:         Pres = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1119:         true = is_presence_with_role(Pres, <<"participant">>)
 1120: 
 1121:     end).
 1122: 
 1123: moderator_voice_forbidden(Config) ->

 1128:         %% Bob joins room
 1129:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1130:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1131:         %% Skip Bob's presence
 1132:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1133: 
 1134:         %% Bob tries to send request approval
 1135:         Appr = stanza_voice_request_approval(?config(room, Config),
 1136:             escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"bob">>),
 1137:         escalus:send(Bob, Appr),

 1142:     end).

 1144: moderator_voice_not_occupant(Config) ->

 1147:         Appr = stanza_voice_request_approval(?config(room, Config),
 1148:             escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"bob">>),
 1149:         escalus:send(Alice, Appr),
 1150: 
 1151:         %% Alice should get an error
 1152:         Err = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1153:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Err)
 1154:     end).
