 1156: moderator_voice_nonick(Config) ->
 1157:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1158:         %% Alice joins room
 1159:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1160:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1161:         %% Bob joins room
 1162:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1163:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1164:         %% Skip Bob's presence
 1165:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1166: 
 1167:         %% Bob sends voice request
 1168:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_voice_request_form(?config(room, Config))),
 1169: 
 1170:         %% Alice should get the request
 1171:         Form = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1172:         true = is_message_form(Form),
 1173: 
 1174:         Appr = stanza_voice_request_approval_nonick(?config(room, Config),
 1175:             escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob)),
 1176:         escalus:send(Alice, Appr),
 1177: 
 1178:         %% Alice should get an error
 1179:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1180:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>],
 1181:             Error)
 1182: 
 1183:     end).
 1184: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1185: %%  Admin use case tests
 1186: %%
 1187: %%  Tests the usecases described here :
 1188: %%  http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0045.html/#admin
 1189: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1190: 
 1191: %%    Examples 110-114
 1192: admin_ban(Config) ->
 1193:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1194:         %% Bob joins room
 1195:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1196:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1197:         %% Kate joins room
 1198:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1199:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 1200:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1201:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1202: 
 1203:         %% Alice bans Bob
 1204:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_ban_user(Bob, ?config(room, Config))),
 1205: 
 1206:         %% Alice receives confirmation
 1207:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1208: 
 1209:         %% Bob receives outcast presence
 1210:         Outcast = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1211:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>], Outcast),
 1212:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1213:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Outcast),
 1214:         true = is_presence_with_status_code(Outcast, <<"301">>),
 1215:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Outcast, <<"outcast">>),
 1216:         true = is_presence_with_role(Outcast, <<"none">>),
 1217: 
 1218:         %% Kate receives Bob's outcast presence
 1219:         BobOutcast = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1220:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>], BobOutcast),
 1221:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(BobOutcast, <<"outcast">>),
 1222:         true = is_presence_with_role(BobOutcast, <<"none">>),
 1223:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)],
 1224:             BobOutcast)
 1225:         %% ejabberd doesn't send jid attribute in presence as in ex. 114
 1226:     end).
 1227: 
 1228: admin_ban_with_reason(Config) ->
 1229:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob, Kate) ->
 1230:         %% Kate joins room
 1231:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1232:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 2),
 1233: 
 1234:         %% Alice bans Kate
 1235:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_ban_user(Kate, ?config(room, Config), <<"Be rational!">>)),
 1236: 
 1237:         %% Alice receives confirmation
 1238:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1239: 
 1240:         %% Kate receives outcast presence
 1241:         Outcast = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1242:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>], Outcast),
 1243:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1244:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)], Outcast),
 1245:         true = is_presence_with_status_code(Outcast, <<"301">>),
 1246:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Outcast, <<"outcast">>),
 1247:         true = is_presence_with_role(Outcast, <<"none">>),
 1248:         true = has_reason(Outcast)
 1249: 
 1250:     end).
 1251: 
 1252: %%    Example 115
 1253: %%    Reponse 'from' field should be full JID, ejabberd provides chatroom JID
 1254: %%    However it's a bit strange as other cancel/not-allowed errors must be from the room JID
 1255: %%    Temporarily left room address check
 1256: admin_ban_higher_user(Config) ->
 1257:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1258:         %% Bob tries to ban Alice
 1259:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_ban_user(Alice, ?config(room, Config))),
 1260: 
 1261:         %% Bob receives an error
 1262:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1263:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Error),
 1264: %%         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1265: %%             [escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob)], Error)
 1266:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1267:             [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1268:     end).
 1269: 
 1270: %%    Examples 116-119
 1271: admin_ban_list(Config) ->
 1272:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1273:         %% Alice requests ban list
 1274: 
 1275:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_ban_list_request(?config(room, Config))),
 1276:         List = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1277:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List),
 1278: 
 1279:         %% Bob and Kate should be banned
 1280:         true = is_iq_with_affiliation(List, <<"outcast">>),
 1281:         true = is_iq_with_short_jid(List, Bob),
 1282:         true = is_iq_with_short_jid(List, Kate),
 1283: 
 1284:         %% Remove Bob's ban
 1285:         stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_MUC_ADMIN, []), ?config(room, Config)),
 1286:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob),<<"none">>},
 1287:             {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Kate), <<"none">>}],
 1288:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items)),
 1289:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1290: 
 1291:         %% Request again
 1292:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_ban_list_request(?config(room, Config))),
 1293:         List2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1294: 
 1295:         %% Noone should be banned
 1296:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))],
 1297:             List2),
 1298:         true = is_item_list_empty(List2)
 1299:     end).
 1300: 
 1301: admin_get_form(Config) ->
 1302:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob, _Kate) ->
 1303:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
 1304:         %%%% Bootstrap:
 1305:         %% Alice is admin
 1306:         %% enter Bob, we make him moderator
 1307:         %% enter Kate, she's just a participant
 1308:         %% Alice joins room
 1309:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1310:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1311:         F = stanza_form_request(?config(room, Config)),
 1312:         escalus:send(Alice, F),
 1313:         Form = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1314: %%        io:format("Result 1: ~p~n", [Form]),
 1315:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Form),
 1316:         ok
 1317:     end),
 1318:     ok.
 1319: 
 1320: admin_invalid_affiliation(Config) ->
 1321:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1322:         %% Bob joins room
 1323:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1324:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1325: 
 1326:         %% Alice tries to give invalid affiliation to Bob
 1327:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config),
 1328:             [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"some-random-affiliation">>}])),
 1329:         %% Alice receives error
 1330:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1331:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Error),
 1332:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Error),
 1333:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1334: 
 1335:     end).
 1336: 
 1337: admin_invalid_jid(Config) ->
 1338:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1339:         %% Bob joins room
 1340:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1341:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1342: 
 1343:         %% Alice tries to give invalid affiliation to Bob
 1344:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config),
 1345:             [{<<"@mistyped-jid">>, <<"admin">>}])),
 1346:         %% Alice receives error
 1347:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1348:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Error),
 1349:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Error),
 1350:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1351: 
 1352:     end).
 1353: 
 1354: %%  Examples 120-127
 1355: admin_membership(Config) ->
 1356:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1357:         %% Bob joins room
 1358:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1359:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1360:         %% Kate joins room
 1361:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1362:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 1363:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1364:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1365: 
 1366:         %% Alice grants membership to Bob
 1367:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob),<<"member">>}],
 1368:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items)),
 1369:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1370: 
 1371:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1372:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1373:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"member">>),
 1374:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1375:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1376: 
 1377:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 1378:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1379:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates, <<"member">>),
 1380:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1381:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 1382: 
 1383:         %% Alice revokes Bob's membership
 1384:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>}],
 1385:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items2)),
 1386:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1387: 
 1388:         %% Bob receives his loss of membership presence
 1389:         Bobs2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1390:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs2, <<"none">>),
 1391:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1392:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs2),
 1393: 
 1394:         %% Kate receives Bob's loss of membership presence
 1395:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1396:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates2, <<"none">>),
 1397:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1398:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates2)
 1399:     end).
 1400: 
 1401: admin_membership_with_reason(Config) ->
 1402:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1403:         %% Bob joins room
 1404:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1405:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1406:         %% Kate joins room
 1407:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1408:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 1409:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1410:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1411: 
 1412:         %% Alice grants membership to Bob
 1413:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob),<<"member">>,<<"Member?">>}],
 1414:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items)),
 1415:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1416: 
 1417:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1418:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1419:         true = has_reason(Bobs),
 1420:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"member">>),
 1421:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1422:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1423: 
 1424:         %% Kates receives Bob's presence
 1425:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1426:         true = has_reason(Kates),
 1427:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"member">>),
 1428:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1429:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1430: 
 1431: 
 1432:         %% Alice revokes Bob's membership
 1433:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>, <<"Your call">>}],
 1434:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items2)),
 1435:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1436: 
 1437:         %% Bob receives his loss of membership presence
 1438:         Bobs2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1439:         true = has_reason(Bobs2),
 1440:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs2, <<"none">>),
 1441:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1442:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs2),
 1443: 
 1444:         %% Kate receives his loss of membership presence
 1445:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1446:         true = has_reason(Kates2),
 1447:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates2, <<"none">>),
 1448:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1449:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates2)
 1450: 
 1451:     end).
 1452: 
 1453: %%  Examples 129-136
 1454: admin_member_list(Config) ->
 1455:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1456:         %% Bob joins room
 1457:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1458:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1459:         %% Kate joins room
 1460:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1461:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 1462:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1463:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1464: 
 1465:         %% Alice requests member list
 1466:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 1467:             ?config(room, Config), <<"member">>)),
 1468:         List = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1469:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List),
 1470: 
 1471:         %% List should be empty
 1472:         true = is_item_list_empty(List),
 1473:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], List),
 1474: 
 1475:         %% Make Bob a member
 1476:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"member">>}],
 1477:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items)),
 1478:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1479: 
 1480:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1481:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1482:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"member">>),
 1483:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1484:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1485: 
 1486:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 1487:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1488:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates, <<"member">>),
 1489:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1490:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 1491: 
 1492:         %% Request again
 1493:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 1494:               ?config(room, Config), <<"member">>)),
 1495:         List2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1496:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List2),
 1497: 
 1498:         %% Bob should be on the list
 1499:         true = is_iq_with_affiliation(List2, <<"member">>),
 1500:         true = is_iq_with_short_jid(List2, Bob),
 1501: 
 1502:         %% Revoke Bob's membership and make Kate a member
 1503:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>},
 1504:             {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Kate), <<"member">>}],
 1505:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room,Config), Items2)),
 1506:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1507: 
 1508:         %% Bob receives his and Kate's presence
 1509:         Preds = [
 1510:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1511:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1512:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>),Stanza) andalso
 1513:                 is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"member">>)
 1514:             end,
 1515:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1516:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1517:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>),Stanza) andalso
 1518:                 is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"none">>)
 1519:             end
 1520:         ],
 1521:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 1522: 
 1523:         %% Kate receives her and Bob's presence
 1524:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 2)),
 1525: 
 1526:         %% Now Kate requests member list, and doesn't get it because she is neither owner, admin or moderator
 1527:         %% and the room is configured without the roomconfig_getmemberlist setting
 1528:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 1529:             ?config(room, Config), <<"member">>)),
 1530:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1531:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Error)
 1532:   end).
 1533: 
 1534: check_memberlist(LoginData, yes, Config) ->
 1535:     escalus:send(LoginData, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 1536:         ?config(room, Config), <<"member">>)),
 1537:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(LoginData));
 1538: check_memberlist(LoginData, no, Config) ->
 1539:     escalus:send(LoginData, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 1540:         ?config(room, Config), <<"member">>)),
 1541:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], escalus:wait_for_stanza(LoginData)).
 1542: 
 1543: check_rolelist(LoginData, yes, Config) ->
 1544:     escalus:send(LoginData, stanza_role_list_request(
 1545:         ?config(room, Config), <<"moderator">>)),
 1546:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(LoginData));
 1547: check_rolelist(LoginData, no, Config) ->
 1548:     escalus:send(LoginData, stanza_role_list_request(
 1549:         ?config(room, Config), <<"moderator">>)),
 1550:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], escalus:wait_for_stanza(LoginData)).
 1551: 
 1552: 
 1553: %% This one tests a roomconfig_getmemberlist setting
 1554: admin_member_list_allowed(Config) ->
 1555:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1556:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
 1557:         %%%% Bootstrap:
 1558:         %% Alice is admin
 1559:         %% enter Bob, we make him moderator
 1560:         %% enter Kate, she's just a participant
 1561:         %% Alice joins room
 1562:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1563:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1564:         %% Bob joins room
 1565:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1566:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1567:         %% Kate joins room
 1568:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1569:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 1570:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1571:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1572:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 1573:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 1574:         %% Grant bob moderator status
 1575:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1576:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"moderator">>}])),
 1577:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1578:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1579:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1580:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 1581:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1582:         %%%% end of bootstrap
 1583:         %% default room setup - config var is empty
 1584:         %% Alice can get member list
 1585:         check_memberlist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1586:         %% Bob can't get member list
 1587:         check_memberlist(Bob, no, Config),
 1588:         %% Kate can't get member list
 1589:         check_memberlist(Kate, no, Config),
 1590:         %% same for role list (it doesn't matter which role we ask, we use moderator)
 1591:         %% Alice can get moderator list
 1592:         check_rolelist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1593:         %% Bob can get moderator list because he is a moderator
 1594:         check_rolelist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1595:         %% Kate can't get member list
 1596:         check_memberlist(Kate, no, Config),
 1597:         %% setup room - allow getmemberlist for moderator
 1598:         Form = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 1599:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_getmemberlist">>, [<<"moderator">>], <<"list-multi">>}]),
 1600:         escalus:send(Alice, Form),
 1601:         Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1602:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result),
 1603:         %% memberlist
 1604:         %% Alice - yes
 1605:         check_memberlist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1606:         %% Bob - yes
 1607:         check_memberlist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1608:         %% Kate - no
 1609:         check_memberlist(Kate, no, Config),
 1610:         %% same for moderator list
 1611:         %% Alice - yes
 1612:         check_rolelist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1613:         %% Bob - yes, as always
 1614:         check_rolelist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1615:         %% Kate - no
 1616:         check_rolelist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1617:         %% setup room - allow getmemberlist for participant
 1618:         Form1 = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 1619:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_getmemberlist">>, [<<"participant">>], <<"list-multi">>}]),
 1620:         escalus:send(Alice, Form1),
 1621:         Result1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1622:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result1),
 1623:         %% memberlist
 1624:         %% Alice - yes
 1625:         check_memberlist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1626:         %% Bob - no (moderator is not a participant)
 1627:         check_memberlist(Bob, no, Config),
 1628:         %% Kate - yes
 1629:         check_memberlist(Kate, yes, Config),
 1630:         %% role list
 1631:         %% Alice - yes
 1632:         check_rolelist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1633:         %% Bob - yes
 1634:         check_rolelist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1635:         %% Kate - yes
 1636:         check_rolelist(Kate, yes, Config),
 1637:         %% exit Kate
 1638:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>), ?config(room, Config),
 1639:             escalus_utils:get_username(Kate))),
 1640:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Kate, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1641:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Kate, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1642:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Kate, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate)),
 1643:         %% memberlist
 1644:         %% Kate - no
 1645:         check_memberlist(Kate, no, Config),
 1646:         %% role list
 1647:         %% Kate - no
 1648:         check_rolelist(Kate, no, Config),
 1649:         %% setup room - allow getmemberlist for visitor
 1650:         Form2 = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 1651:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_getmemberlist">>, [<<"visitor">>], <<"list-multi">>}]),
 1652:         escalus:send(Alice, Form2),
 1653:         Result2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1654:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result2),
 1655:         %% member list
 1656:         %% Alice - yes
 1657:         check_memberlist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1658:         %% Bob - no (gahhh...)
 1659:         check_memberlist(Bob, no, Config),
 1660:         %% Kate - yes
 1661:         check_memberlist(Kate, yes, Config),
 1662:         %% role list
 1663:         %% Alice - yes (as admin)
 1664:         check_rolelist(Alice, yes, Config),
 1665:         %% Bob - yes (as moderator)
 1666:         check_rolelist(Bob, yes, Config),
 1667:         %% Kate - yes (as visitor)
 1668:         check_rolelist(Kate, yes, Config),
 1669:         ok
 1670:     end),
 1671:     ok.
 1672: 
 1673: %%  Examples 137-145
 1674: admin_moderator(Config) ->
 1675:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1676:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
 1677:         %% Alice joins room
 1678:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1679:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1680:         %% Bob joins room
 1681:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1682:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1683:         %% Kate joins room
 1684:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1685:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 1686:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1687:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1688:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 1689:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 1690: 
 1691:         %% Grant bob moderator status
 1692:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1693:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"moderator">>}])),
 1694:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, is_presence], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 1695: 
 1696:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1697:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1698:         true = is_presence_with_role(Bobs, <<"moderator">>),
 1699:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1700:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1701: 
 1702:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 1703:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1704:         true = is_presence_with_role(Kates, <<"moderator">>),
 1705:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1706:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 1707: 
 1708:         %% Revoke bob moderator status
 1709:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
 1710:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1711:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>),Stanza) andalso
 1712:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>)
 1713:         end,
 1714: 
 1715:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1716:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>, <<"participant">>}])),
 1717:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 1718: 
 1719:         %% Bob receives his loss of moderator presence
 1720:         Bobs2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1721:         true = is_presence_with_role(Bobs2, <<"participant">>),
 1722:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1723:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs2),
 1724: 
 1725:         %% Kate receives Bob's loss of moderator presence
 1726:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1727:         true = is_presence_with_role(Kates2, <<"participant">>),
 1728:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1729:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates2)
 1730: 
 1731:     end).
 1732: 
 1733: admin_moderator_with_reason(Config) ->
 1734:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1735:         %% Alice joins room
 1736:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1737:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1738:         %% Bob joins room
 1739:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1740:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1741:         %% Kate joins room
 1742:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1743:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 1744:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1745:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1746:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 1747:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 1748: 
 1749:         %% Grant bob moderator status
 1750:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1751:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"moderator">>,<<"He should be fair">>}])),
 1752:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, is_presence], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 1753: 
 1754:         %% Bob receives his notice
 1755:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1756:         true = is_presence_with_role(Bobs, <<"moderator">>),
 1757:         true = has_reason(Bobs),
 1758:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1759:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 1760: 
 1761:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 1762:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1763:         true = has_reason(Kates),
 1764:         true = is_presence_with_role(Kates, <<"moderator">>),
 1765:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1766:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 1767: 
 1768:         %% Revoke bob moderator status
 1769:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
 1770:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1771:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>),Stanza) andalso
 1772:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>)
 1773:         end,
 1774: 
 1775:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1776:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>, <<"participant">>, <<"He wasn't">>}])),
 1777:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 1778: 
 1779:         %% Bob receives his loss of moderator presence
 1780:         Bobs2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1781:         true = is_presence_with_role(Bobs2, <<"participant">>),
 1782:         true = has_reason(Bobs2),
 1783:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1784:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs2),
 1785: 
 1786:         %% Kate receives Bob's loss of moderator presence
 1787:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1788:         true = is_presence_with_role(Kates2, <<"participant">>),
 1789:         true = has_reason(Kates2),
 1790:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1791:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates2)
 1792: 
 1793:     end).
 1794: %%  Examples 145, 150
 1795: admin_moderator_revoke_owner(Config) ->
 1796:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 1797:         %% Alice joins room
 1798:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1799:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1800: 
 1801:         %% Alice tries to revoke moderator status from herself
 1802:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1803:              ?config(room, Config), [{<<"alice">>, <<"participant">>}])),
 1804: 
 1805:         %% Should be an error
 1806:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1807:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Error),
 1808:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1809:     end).
 1810: 
 1811: %%  Examples 146-150
 1812: admin_moderator_list(Config) ->
 1813:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1814:         %% Alice joins room
 1815:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1816:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1817:         %% Bob joins room
 1818:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1819:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1820:         %% Kate joins room
 1821:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1822:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 1823:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1824:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1825:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 1826:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 1827: 
 1828:         %% Request moderator list
 1829:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_role_list_request(
 1830:             ?config(room, Config), <<"moderator">>)),
 1831:         List = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1832:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List),
 1833:         %% Alice should be on it
 1834:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List, Alice),
 1835:         true = is_iq_with_role(List, <<"moderator">>),
 1836: 
 1837:         %% Grant Bob and Kate moderators role
 1838:         Preds = [
 1839:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1840:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1841:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>),Stanza) andalso
 1842:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"moderator">>)
 1843:             end,
 1844:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1845:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1846:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>),Stanza) andalso
 1847:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"moderator">>)
 1848:             end
 1849:         ],
 1850:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room, Config),
 1851:             [{<<"bob">>,<<"moderator">>},{<<"kate">>,<<"moderator">>}])),
 1852:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result | Preds], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,3)),
 1853: 
 1854:         %% Bob receives his and Kate's moderator presence
 1855:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob,2)),
 1856: 
 1857:         %% Kate receives her and Bob's moderator presence
 1858:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate,2)),
 1859: 
 1860:         %% Request again
 1861:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_role_list_request(
 1862:             ?config(room, Config), <<"moderator">>)),
 1863:         List2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1864:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List2),
 1865: 
 1866:         %% Alice, Bob and Kate should be on it
 1867:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List2, Alice),
 1868:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List2, Bob),
 1869:         true = is_iq_with_jid(List2, Kate),
 1870: 
 1871:         %% Revoke Bob's and Kate's roles
 1872:         Preds2 = [
 1873:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1874:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1875:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>),Stanza) andalso
 1876:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>)
 1877:             end,
 1878:             fun(Stanza) ->
 1879:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 1880:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>),Stanza) andalso
 1881:                 is_presence_with_role(Stanza, <<"participant">>)
 1882:             end
 1883:         ],
 1884:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(?config(room, Config),
 1885:               [{<<"bob">>,<<"participant">>},{<<"kate">>,<<"participant">>}])),
 1886:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result|Preds2], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,3)),
 1887: 
 1888:         %% Bob receives his and Kate's participant presence
 1889:         escalus:assert_many(Preds2, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob,2)),
 1890: 
 1891:         %% Kate receives her and Bob's participant presence
 1892:         escalus:assert_many(Preds2, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate,2))
 1893:     end).
 1894: 
 1895: admin_invalid_role(Config) ->
 1896:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1897:         %% Alice joins room
 1898:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1899:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1900:         %% Bob joins room
 1901:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1902:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1903:         %% Skip Bob's presences
 1904:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1905: 
 1906:         %% Grant bob moderator status
 1907:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1908:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"bob">>,<<"role-that-i-made-up">>}])),
 1909:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1910:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Error),
 1911:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>], Error),
 1912:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1913:     end).
 1914: 
 1915: admin_invalid_nick(Config) ->
 1916:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1917:         %% Alice joins room
 1918:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 1919:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 1920:         %% Bob joins room
 1921:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1922:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1923:         %% Skip Bob's presences
 1924:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1925: 
 1926:         %% Grant bob moderator status
 1927:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_roles(
 1928:             ?config(room, Config), [{<<"mistyped-nickname">>,<<"moderator">>}])),
 1929:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1930:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Error),
 1931:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Error),
 1932:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 1933:     end).
 1934: 
 1935: %%  Example 128
 1936: admin_mo_revoke(Config) ->
 1937:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 1938:         %% Make Bob and Kate members
 1939:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"member">>},
 1940:             {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Kate), <<"member">>}],
 1941:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room,Config), Items)),
 1942:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1943: 
 1944:         %% Bob gets invitation
 1945:         is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1946:         %% Kate gets invitation
 1947:         is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate)),
 1948: 
 1949:         %% Bob joins room
 1950:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 1951:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1952:         %% Kate joins room
 1953:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 1954:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 1955:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 1956:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1957: 
 1958:         %% Alice revokes Bob's membership
 1959:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>}],
 1960:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items2)),
 1961:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1962: 
 1963:         %% Skip Bob's lost of membership presence (tested in the other case)
 1964:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1965: 
 1966:         %% Kate receives Bob's loss of unavailable presence
 1967:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 1968:         true = is_membership_presence(Kates, <<"none">>, <<"none">>),
 1969:         true = is_unavailable_presence(Kates, <<"321">>),
 1970:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 1971:             [room_address(?config(room, Config),<<"bob">>)], Kates)
 1972:     end).
 1973: 
 1974: %%  Example 134
 1975: %%  ejabberd doesn't send an invitation after adding user to a member list
 1976: admin_mo_invite(Config) ->
 1977:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1978:         %% Make Bob a member
 1979:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"member">>}],
 1980:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room,Config), Items)),
 1981:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1982: 
 1983:         %% Bob should receive an invitation
 1984:         Inv = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1985:         is_invitation(Inv),
 1986:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room,Config))], Inv),
 1987: 
 1988:         %% Alice revokes Bob's membership
 1989:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>}],
 1990:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items2)),
 1991:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
 1992:     end).
 1993: 
 1994: admin_mo_invite_with_reason(Config) ->
 1995:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1996:         %% Make Bob a member
 1997:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"member">>, <<"Just an invitation">>}],
 1998:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room,Config), Items)),
 1999:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2000: 
 2001:         %% Bob should receive an invitation
 2002:         Inv = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2003:         is_invitation(Inv),
 2004:         true = invite_has_reason(Inv),
 2005:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room,Config))], Inv),
 2006: 
 2007:         %% Alice revokes Bob's membership
 2008:         Items2 = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"none">>}],
 2009:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room, Config), Items2)),
 2010:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
 2011:     end).
 2012: 
 2013: %%  Example 135
 2014: %%  ejabberd returns cancel/not-allowed error while it should return auth/forbidden according to XEP
 2015: admin_mo_invite_mere(Config) ->
 2016:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2017:         %% Make Bob a member
 2018:         Items = [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"member">>}],
 2019:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(?config(room,Config), Items)),
 2020:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2021: 
 2022:         %% Bob gets na invitation
 2023:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2024: 
 2025:         %% Bob joins room
 2026:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 2027:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2028: 
 2029:         %% Bob tries to invite Kate
 2030:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_mediated_invitation(?config(room,Config), Kate)),
 2031: 
 2032:         %% He should receive an error
 2033:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2034:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Error),
 2035:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error)
 2036:     end).
 2037: 
 2038: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2039: %%  Occupant use case tests
 2040: %%
 2041: %%  Tests the usecases described here :
 2042: %%  http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0045.html/#user
 2043: %%
 2044: %%  note: new user presence broadcast is unconfigurable and enabled for participants
 2045: %%  by default
 2046: %%
 2047: %%  convention - in this part of the suite user names are uses aas nicknames if a testcase does not require otherwise
 2048: %%  TO DO:
 2049: %%
 2050: %%  JID is not sent to participancts, use owner to throuhtly test some of the use cases
 2051: %%  is this behavious configurable?
 2052: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2053: %Example 18
 2054: groupchat_user_enter(Config) ->
 2055:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(_Alice, Bob) ->
 2056:         EnterRoomStanza = stanza_groupchat_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob)),
 2057:         escalus:send(Bob, EnterRoomStanza),
 2058:         Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2059:         escalus_pred:is_presence(Presence),
 2060: 		From = room_address(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob)),
 2061: 		From = exml_query:attr(Presence, <<"from">>)
 2062: 	end).
 2063: 
 2064: %Example 19
 2065: %Fails - no error message sent from the server
 2066: groupchat_user_enter_no_nickname(Config) ->
 2067:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2068:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_groupchat_enter_room_no_nick(?config(room, Config))),
 2069: 		escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"jid-malformed">>], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2070:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 2071:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
 2072:     end).
 2073: 
 2074: 
 2075: % Examples 20, 21, 22
 2076: % Fails - no 110 status code in the self-presence messages
 2077: muc_user_enter(Config) ->
 2078:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(_Alice, Bob, Eve) ->
 2079:         %Bob enters the room
 2080:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2081: 
 2082:         Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2083: 		is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence, <<"none">>),
 2084: 		is_self_presence(Bob, ?config(room, Config), Presence),
 2085:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),   %topic
 2086: 
 2087:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve))),
 2088: 
 2089:         Presence2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2090: 		is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence2, <<"none">>),
 2091: 		is_presence_from(Eve, ?config(room, Config), Presence2),
 2092: 
 2093:         Presence3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve),
 2094: 		is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence3, <<"none">>),
 2095: 		is_presence_from(Bob, ?config(room, Config), Presence3),
 2096: 
 2097:         Presence4 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve),
 2098: 		is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence4, <<"none">>),
 2099: 		is_self_presence(Eve, ?config(room, Config), Presence4),
 2100:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)   %topic
 2101:     end).

 2105: 
 2106: % Example 25, 26
 2107: % fails - sends an additional message instead of including code 100 in the presence
 2108: enter_non_anonymous_room(Config) ->
 2109:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(_Alice,  Bob) ->
 2110:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2111: 		%should include code 100 in the presence messages to inform users alobut the room being non-annymous.
 2112: 		%sends an additional simple message instead
 2113:         Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2114: 		is_self_presence(Bob, ?config(room, Config), Presence),
 2115: 		has_status_codes(Presence, [<<"100">>]),
 2116:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob) %topic
 2117:     end).

 2147: %Example 30
 2148: deny_entry_to_a_banned_user(Config) ->
 2149:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob) ->
 2150:         %% Alice bans Bob
 2151:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_ban_user(Bob, ?config(room, Config))),
 2152:         %% Alice receives confirmation
 2153:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2154:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2155:         escalus_assert:is_error(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob), <<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>)
 2156:     end).
 2157: 
 2158: %Examlpe 31
 2159: deny_entry_nick_conflict(Config) ->
 2160:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(_Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2161:         EnterRoomStanza = stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob)),
 2162:         escalus:send(Bob, EnterRoomStanza),
 2163:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2164:         escalus:send(Eve, EnterRoomStanza),
 2165:         escalus_assert:is_error(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve), <<"cancel">>, <<"conflict">>)
 2166:     end).
 2167: 
 2168: % Entering the room by one user from different devices
 2169: multi_sessions_messages(Config) ->
 2170:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob, Bob2) ->
 2171:         populate_room_with_users([Alice, Bob, Bob2], Config),
 2172: 
 2173:         Msg = <<"Hi, Bobs!">>,
 2174:         escalus:send(Alice,escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config)), Msg)),
 2175: 
 2176:         true = is_groupchat_message(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2177:         true = is_groupchat_message(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2178:         true = is_groupchat_message(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2)),
 2179: 
 2180:         Msg2 = <<"Chat, Bobs!">>,
 2181:         ChatMessage = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob)), Msg2),
 2182:         escalus:send(Alice, ChatMessage),
 2183: 
 2184:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config),
 2185:             escalus_utils:get_username(Alice), <<"chat">>, Msg2, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2186:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config),
 2187:             escalus_utils:get_username(Alice), <<"chat">>, Msg2, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2)),
 2188: 
 2189:         Msg3 = <<"Chat, Alice!">>,
 2190:         ChatMessage2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice)), Msg3),
 2191:         escalus:send(Bob, ChatMessage2),
 2192: 
 2193:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config),
 2194:             escalus_utils:get_username(Bob), <<"chat">>, Msg3, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
 2195:     end).
 2196: 
 2197: % Entering the room by one user from different devices
 2198: multi_sessions_enter(Config) ->
 2199:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob, Bob2) ->
 2200:         populate_room_with_users([Alice, Bob, Bob2], Config)
 2201:     end).
 2202: 
 2203: % Exiting from the room with multiple sessions
 2204: multi_sessions_exit(Config) ->
 2205:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob, Bob2) ->
 2206:         populate_room_with_users([Alice, Bob, Bob2], Config),
 2207: 
 2208:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>), ?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice))),
 2209:         Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2210:         has_status_codes(Message, [<<"110">>]),
 2211:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), Message),
 2212:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2213:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2))
 2214:     end).
 2215: 
 2216: % Exiting from the room with multiple sessions
 2217: multi_sessions_exit_session(Config) ->
 2218:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob, Bob2) ->
 2219:         populate_room_with_users([Alice, Bob, Bob2], Config),
 2220: 
 2221:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>), ?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice))),
 2222:         Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2223:         has_status_codes(Message, [<<"110">>]),
 2224:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Bob, <<"owner">>, ?config(room, Config), Message),
 2225:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Bob, <<"owner">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2)),
 2226: 
 2227:         escalus:send(Bob2, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>), ?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice))),
 2228:         Message2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2),
 2229:         has_status_codes(Message2, [<<"110">>]),
 2230:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Bob2, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), Message2),
 2231:         assert_is_exit_message_correct(Bob2, <<"none">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
 2232:     end).
 2233: 
 2234: % Entering the room by one user from different devices with multiple sessions disabled
 2235: deny_entry_with_multiple_sessions_disallowed(Config) ->
 2236:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(_Alice, Bob, Bob2) ->
 2237:         EnterRoomStanza = stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob)),
 2238:         escalus:send(Bob, EnterRoomStanza),
 2239: 
 2240:         Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2241:         is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence, <<"none">>),
 2242:         is_self_presence(Bob, ?config(room, Config), Presence),
 2243:         is_subject_message(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2244: 
 2245:         escalus:send(Bob2, EnterRoomStanza),
 2246:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2),
 2247:         escalus_assert:is_error(Stanza, <<"cancel">>, <<"conflict">>)
 2248:     end).
 2249:

 2275: %Example 34

 2280: 		Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),

 2282: 		has_status_codes(Presence, [<<"170">>])

 2286: %Example 35
 2287: send_history(Config) ->
 2288:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2289:         escalus:send(Alice , stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Alice))),
 2290:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 2291:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob))),
 2292:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2293:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2294: 		Msg= <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 2295: 		Msg2= <<"Hi, Alice!">>,
 2296: 		escalus:send(Alice,escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config)), Msg)),
 2297: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2298:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2299: 		escalus:send(Bob,escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config)), Msg2)),
 2300: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2301:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2302: 
 2303: 		%Eve enters and receives the presences, the message history and finally the topic
 2304:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Eve))),
 2305: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2306: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2307:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 3), %presences
 2308: 		is_history_message_correct(?config(room, Config), nick(Alice),<<"groupchat">>,Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2309: 		is_history_message_correct(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob),<<"groupchat">>,Msg2, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2310: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve),	%topic
 2311: 		escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 2312: 		escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2313: 		escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Eve)
 2314:     end).

 2520: %Example 44, 45
 2521: send_to_all(Config) ->
 2522:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(_Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2523:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2524:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2525:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve))),
 2526: 		escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2527: 		escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 3),
 2528: 
 2529:         Msg = <<"chat message">>,
 2530:         escalus:send(Eve, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config)), Msg)),
 2531:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve), <<"groupchat">>, Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2532:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve), <<"groupchat">>, Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2533:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2534:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Eve)
 2535:     end).

 2538: %Examples 46, 47
 2539: send_and_receive_private_message(Config) ->
 2540:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(_Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2541:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2542:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2543:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve))),
 2544:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 3),
 2545:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2546: 
 2547:         Msg = <<"chat message">>,
 2548:         ChatMessage = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve)), Msg),
 2549:         escalus:send(Bob,ChatMessage),
 2550:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob), <<"chat">>, Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2551:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2552:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Eve)
 2553:     end).

 2555: %Example 48
 2556: send_private_groupchat(Config) ->
 2557:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2558:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2559:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2560:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve))),
 2561:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2562:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 3),
 2563: 
 2564:         Msg = <<"chat message">>,
 2565:         ChatMessage = escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), nick(Eve)), Msg),
 2566:         escalus:send(Bob,ChatMessage ),
 2567:         escalus_assert:is_error(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob), <<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>),
 2568: 
 2569:         escalus:send(Bob,escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"non-existent">>), Msg)),
 2570:         escalus_assert:is_error(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob), <<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>),
 2571: 
 2572:         escalus:send(Alice,escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob)), Msg)),
 2573:         escalus_assert:is_error(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), <<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>),
 2574: 
 2575:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2576:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Eve)
 2577:     end).

 2619: %Example 54, 55
 2620: %Full JID is not sent to participants, just to the owner. Assumess this to be the default configuration
 2621: change_availability_status(Config) ->
 2622:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob) ->
 2623: 		escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob))),
 2624:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2625:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Alice))),
 2626:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2627:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2628:         Status = <<"Bobs awesome new status">>,
 2629:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_change_availability(Status, ?config(room, Config), nick(Bob))),
 2630:         is_availability_status_notification_correct(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob), Status,  escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2631:         Notification = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2632:         is_availability_status_notification_correct(?config(room, Config), nick(Bob), Status,  Notification),
 2633:         Jid = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 2634:         Jid = exml_query:path(Notification, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"item">>}, {attr, <<"jid">>}])
 2635:     end).

 2640: %Example 56-59
 2641: mediated_invite(Config) ->
 2642:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2643:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), nick(Alice))),
 2644:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 2645:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_mediated_invitation(?config(room, Config), Bob)),
 2646:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_mediated_invitation(?config(room, Config), Eve)),
 2647:         %Bob ignores the invitation, Eve formally declines
 2648: 		is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2649: 		is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2650: 		escalus:send(Eve, stanza_mediated_invitation_decline(?config(room, Config), Alice)),
 2651: 		is_invitation_decline(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
 2652:     end).

 2654: %Example 60-65
 2655: %No <thread> tag, so right now this does not test any new functionality. The thread
 2656: %tag is recommended, but not required, so the test will not fail because of its absence
 2657: %Also - the examples contain neither configuration of the room not confirmation that it
 2658: %is supposed to be instant. Thit test assumes that an instant room should be created
 2659: one2one_chat_to_muc(Config) ->
 2660:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2661:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob,<<"Hi,Bob!">>),
 2662:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice,<<"Hi,Alice!">>),
 2663:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
 2664:         escalus:send(Bob, Msg2),
 2665:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2666:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2667: 
 2668:         %Alice creates a room
 2669:         Room = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2670:         escalus:send(Alice,stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice">>)),
 2671:         was_room_created(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2672: 
 2673:         R = escalus_stanza:setattr(stanza_instant_room(room_address(Room)),
 2674:                                    <<"from">>, escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice)),
 2675:         escalus:send(Alice, R),
 2676:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), %topic
 2677:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2678: 
 2679:         %Alice sends history to the room
 2680:         NewMsg1 = escalus_stanza:setattr(Msg1, <<"type">>, <<"groupchat">>),
 2681:         %print(stanza_to_room(NewMsg1,Room)),
 2682:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(NewMsg1,Room)),
 2683:         NewMsg2 = escalus_stanza:setattr(Msg2, <<"type">>, <<"groupchat">>),
 2684:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(NewMsg2,Room)),
 2685: 
 2686:         %Alice sends invitations
 2687:         %invitations should include contiue flag, but this makes no sense without the thread
 2688:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_mediated_invitation_multi(Room, [Bob, Eve])),
 2689:         is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2690:         is_invitation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2691:         %Bob and Eve accept the invitations
 2692:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 2693:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 2694:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"eve">>)),
 2695:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 3), %presences
 2696:         %Bob and Eve receive the history
 2697:         is_history_message_correct(Room, <<"alice">>,<<"groupchat">>,<<"Hi,Bob!">>, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2698:         is_history_message_correct(Room, <<"alice">>,<<"groupchat">>,<<"Hi,Alice!">>, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2699:         is_history_message_correct(Room, <<"alice">>,<<"groupchat">>,<<"Hi,Bob!">>, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2700:         is_history_message_correct(Room, <<"alice">>,<<"groupchat">>,<<"Hi,Alice!">>, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve)),
 2701:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2), %messages
 2702:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2), %presences
 2703:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),   %topic & Eves presence
 2704:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 1),   %topic
 2705:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 2706:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2707:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Eve)
 2708:     end).

 2750: %Example 80-82
 2751: %No 110 status code in self-presence messages
 2752: %No Jid, not event when the owner leaves tehe room (normally the owner receives senders jid along with a message
 2753: exit_room(Config) ->
 2754:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice,  Bob, Eve) ->
 2755:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice))),
 2756:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 2757:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 2758:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2759:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2760:         escalus:send(Eve, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Eve))),
 2761:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Eve, 4),
 2762:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2763:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2764: 		escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>), ?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Alice))),
 2765: 		Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2766: 		has_status_codes(Message, [<<"110">>]),
 2767: 		assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"owner">>, ?config(room, Config), Message),
 2768: 		assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"owner">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 2769: 		assert_is_exit_message_correct(Alice, <<"owner">>, ?config(room, Config), escalus:wait_for_stanza(Eve))
 2770:     end).

 2805: disco_service(Config) ->
 2806:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 2807:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 2808:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 2809:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2810:         escalus:assert(has_service, [?MUC_HOST], Stanza),
 2811:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config)], Stanza)
 2812:     end).
 2813: 
 2814: disco_features(Config) ->
 2815:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 2816:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_features()),
 2817:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2818:         has_features(Stanza),
 2819:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [?MUC_HOST], Stanza)
 2820:     end).
 2821: 
 2822: disco_rooms(Config) ->
 2823:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 2824:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_rooms()),
 2825:         %% we should have 1 room, created in init
 2826:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2827:         count_rooms(Stanza, 1),
 2828:         has_room(room_address(<<"alicesroom">>), Stanza),
 2829:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [?MUC_HOST], Stanza)
 2830:     end).
 2831: 
 2832: disco_info(Config) ->
 2833:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 2834:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_INFO,[]), <<"alicesroom">>)),
 2835:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2836:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 2837:         has_feature(Stanza, <<"muc_persistent">>)
 2838:     end).
 2839: 
 2840: disco_items(Config) ->
 2841:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2842:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_join_room(<<"alicesroom">>, <<"nicenick">>)),
 2843:         _Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2844: 
 2845:         %% works because the list is public
 2846:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_ITEMS,[]), <<"alicesroom">>)),
 2847:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2848:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza2)
 2849:                                  end).
 2850: 
 2851: disco_items_nonpublic(Config) ->
 2852:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2853:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_join_room(<<"alicesroom">>, <<"nicenick">>)),
 2854:         _Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2855: 
 2856:         %% does not work because the list is not public and Bob is not an occupant
 2857:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_ITEMS,[]), <<"alicesroom">>)),
 2858:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 2859:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Error)
 2860:     end).

 2864:         Room1 = stanza_enter_room(<<"room1">>, <<"nick1">>),
 2865:         escalus:send(Alice, Room1),
 2866:         was_room_created(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2867:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),

 2869:         DestroyRoom1 = stanza_destroy_room(<<"room1">>),
 2870:         escalus:send(Alice, DestroyRoom1),
 2871:         [Presence, Iq] = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 2872:         was_room_destroyed(Iq),
 2873:         was_destroy_presented(Presence)
 2874:     end).

 2926: %% Example 155. Owner Requests Instant Room
 2927: create_instant_room(Config) ->
 2928:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2929: 
 2930:         %% Create the room (should be locked on creation)
 2931:         Presence = stanza_muc_enter_room(<<"room1">>, <<"alice-the-owner">>),
 2932:         escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
 2933:         was_room_created(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2934: 
 2935:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), % topic
 2936: 
 2937:         R = escalus_stanza:setattr(stanza_instant_room(<<"room1@muc.localhost">>),
 2938:                                    <<"from">>, escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice)),
 2939:         escalus:send(Alice, R),
 2940:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2941:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 2942: 
 2943:         %% Bob should be able to join the room
 2944:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(<<"room1">>, <<"bob">>)),
 2945:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), %Bobs presence
 2946:         %% Bob should receive (in that order): Alices presence, his presence and the topic
 2947: 
 2948:         Preds = [fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza) andalso
 2949:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(<<"room1@muc.localhost/bob">>, Stanza)
 2950:         end,
 2951:         fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza) andalso
 2952:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(<<"room1@muc.localhost/alice-the-owner">>, Stanza)
 2953:         end],
 2954:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 2955:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob), %topic
 2956:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 2957:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
 2958:     end).
 2959: 
 2960: destroy_locked_room(Config) ->
 2961:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 2962:         Room1 = stanza_muc_enter_room(<<"room1">>, <<"nick1">>),
 2963:         escalus:send(Alice, Room1),
 2964:         was_room_created(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 2965:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2966: 
 2967:         DestroyRoom1 = stanza_destroy_room(<<"room1">>),
 2968:         escalus:send(Alice, DestroyRoom1),
 2969:         [Presence, Iq] = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 2970:         was_room_destroyed(Iq),
 2971:         was_destroy_presented(Presence)
 2972:     end).

 2989:         true = is_form(S)
 2990:

 3066:         true = is_form(S),

 3069:         Form = stanza_configuration_form(<<"roomfive">>, [
 3070:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_publicroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>},
 3071:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_moderatedroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>},
 3072:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_persistentroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>}]),

 3081:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),

 3125: %%  Ejabberd doesn't let set admins nor owners in configuration form so testcases for ex. 167-170 would be useless
 3126: 
 3127: configure(Config) ->
 3128:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
 3129:         %% Alice requests configuration form
 3130:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(
 3131:             escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_OWNER,[]), ?config(room, Config))),
 3132: 
 3133:         %% Alice receives form
 3134:         Res = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3135:         true = is_form(Res),
 3136:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Res),
 3137: 
 3138:         %% Configure room to be moderated, public and persistent
 3139:         Form = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 3140:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_publicroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>},
 3141:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_moderatedroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>},
 3142:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_persistentroom">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>}]),
 3143:         escalus:send(Alice, Form),
 3144: 
 3145:         Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3146:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result),
 3147:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3148:             [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Result),
 3149: 
 3150:         %% Check if it worked
 3151:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(
 3152:             ?NS_DISCO_INFO,[]), ?config(room, Config))),
 3153:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3154:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 3155:         has_feature(Stanza, <<"muc_persistent">>),
 3156:         has_feature(Stanza, <<"muc_moderated">>),
 3157:         has_feature(Stanza, <<"muc_public">>)
 3158:     end).

 3160: %%  Example 171
 3161: %%  This test needs enabled mod_muc_log module and {access_log, muc_create} in options
 3162: %%  This test fails, ejabberd doesn't seem to send status code when room privacy changes
 3163: configure_logging(Config) ->
 3164:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 3165:         %% Bob joins room
 3166:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob))),
 3167:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Kate))),
 3168:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 3169:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 3),
 3170: 
 3171:         %% Alice requests configuration form
 3172:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(
 3173:             escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_OWNER,[]), ?config(room, Config))),
 3174: 
 3175:         %% Alice receives form
 3176:         Res = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3177:         true = is_form(Res),
 3178:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Res),
 3179: 
 3180:          %% Configure room with logging enabled
 3181:         Form = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 3182:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_enablelogging">>, <<"1">>, <<"boolean">>}]),
 3183:         escalus:send(Alice, Form),
 3184: 
 3185:         Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3186:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result),
 3187:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3188:             [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Result),
 3189: 
 3190:         Res2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3191:         true = is_message_with_status_code(Res2, <<"170">>),
 3192:         true = is_groupchat_message(Res2),
 3193:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Res2),
 3194: 
 3195:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 3196: 
 3197:         %% Alice requests configuration form again
 3198:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(
 3199:             escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_OWNER,[]), ?config(room, Config))),
 3200: 
 3201:         %% Alice receives form
 3202:         Res3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3203:         true = is_form(Res3),
 3204:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Res3),
 3205: 
 3206:         %% Simple message exchange
 3207:         Msg = <<"chat message">>,
 3208:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(room_address(?config(room, Config)), Msg)),
 3209:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob), <<"groupchat">>, Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 3210:         assert_is_message_correct(?config(room, Config), escalus_utils:get_username(Bob), <<"groupchat">>, Msg, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate)),
 3211: 
 3212:         %% Disable logging
 3213:         Form2 = stanza_configuration_form(?config(room, Config), [
 3214:             {<<"muc#roomconfig_enablelogging">>, <<"0">>, <<"boolean">>}]),
 3215:         escalus:send(Alice, Form2),
 3216: 
 3217:         Result2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3218:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Result2),
 3219:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3220:             [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Result2),
 3221: 
 3222:         Res4 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3223:         true = is_message_with_status_code(Res4, <<"171">>),
 3224:         true = is_groupchat_message(Res4),
 3225:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Res4),
 3226: 
 3227:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate)
 3228:     end).
 3229:
