 3288: %%  Examples 172-180
 3289: owner_grant_revoke(Config) ->
 3290:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 3291:         %% Alice joins room
 3292:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 3293:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 3294:         %% Bob joins room
 3295:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 3296:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 3297:         %% Kate joins room
 3298:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 3299:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 3300:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 3301:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3302:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 3303:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 3304: 
 3305:         %% Grant bob owner status
 3306:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3307:             ?config(room, Config),
 3308:                 [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob),<<"owner">>}])),
 3309:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, is_presence], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 3310: 
 3311:         %% Bob receives his notice
 3312:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3313:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"owner">>),
 3314:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3315:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 3316: 
 3317:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 3318:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 3319:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates, <<"owner">>),
 3320:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3321:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 3322: 
 3323:         %% Revoke alice owner status
 3324:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
 3325:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3326:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>),Stanza) andalso
 3327:                 is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"admin">>)
 3328:         end,
 3329: 
 3330:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3331:             ?config(room, Config),
 3332:                 [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Alice), <<"admin">>}])),
 3333:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 3334: 
 3335:         %% Alice receives her loss of ownership presence
 3336:         Alices = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3337:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Alices, <<"admin">>),
 3338:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3339:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"alice">>)], Alices),
 3340: 
 3341:         %% Kate receives Alice's loss of ownership presence
 3342:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 3343:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates2, <<"admin">>),
 3344:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3345:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"alice">>)], Kates2)
 3346: 
 3347:     end).
 3348: 
 3349: owner_grant_revoke_with_reason(Config) ->
 3350:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 3351:         %% Alice joins room
 3352:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 3353:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 3354:         %% Bob joins room
 3355:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 3356:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 3357:         %% Kate joins room
 3358:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 3359:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 3360:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 3361:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3362:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 3363:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 3364: 
 3365:         %% Grant bob owner status
 3366:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3367:             ?config(room, Config),
 3368:                 [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob),<<"owner">>,<<"I trust him">>}])),
 3369:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, is_presence], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
 3370: 
 3371:         %% Bob receives his notice
 3372:         Bobs = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3373:         true = has_reason(Bobs),
 3374:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Bobs, <<"owner">>),
 3375:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3376:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Bobs),
 3377: 
 3378:         %% Kate receives Bob's notice
 3379:         Kates = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 3380:         true = has_reason(Kates),
 3381:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates, <<"owner">>),
 3382:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3383:             [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Kates),
 3384: 
 3385:         %% Revoke alice owner status
 3386:         Pred = fun(Stanza) ->
 3387:                 escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3388:                   room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>),Stanza) andalso
 3389:                 is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"admin">>)
 3390:         end,
 3391: 
 3392:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3393:             ?config(room, Config),
 3394:                 [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Alice),
 3395:                     <<"admin">>, <<"Assassination!">>}])),
 3396:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, Pred], escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 3397: 
 3398:         %% Alice receives her loss of ownership presence
 3399:         Alices = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3400:         true = has_reason(Alices),
 3401:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Alices, <<"admin">>),
 3402:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3403:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"alice">>)], Alices),
 3404: 
 3405:         %% Kate receives Alice's loss of ownership presence
 3406:         Kates2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Kate),
 3407:         true = has_reason(Kates2),
 3408:         true = is_presence_with_affiliation(Kates2, <<"admin">>),
 3409:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3410:             [room_address(?config(room,Config), <<"alice">>)], Kates2)
 3411: 
 3412:     end).
 3413: %%  Examples 181-185
 3414: %%  Behaves strange when we try to revoke the only owner together with
 3415: %%  granting someone else
 3416: owner_list(Config) ->
 3417:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 3418:         %% Alice joins room
 3419:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"alice">>)),
 3420:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
 3421:         %% Bob joins room
 3422:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 3423:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 3424:         %% Kate joins room
 3425:         escalus:send(Kate, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>)),
 3426:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 4),
 3427:         %% Skip Kate's presence
 3428:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3429:         %% Skip Kate's and Bob's presences
 3430:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 3431: 
 3432:         %% Alice requests owner list
 3433:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_affiliation_list_request(
 3434:             ?config(room, Config), <<"owner">>)),
 3435:         List = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3436: 
 3437:         %% Alice should be on it
 3438:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, List),
 3439:         true = is_iq_with_affiliation(List, <<"owner">>),
 3440:         true = is_iq_with_short_jid(List, Alice),
 3441: 
 3442:         %% Grant Bob and Kate owners status
 3443:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3444:             ?config(room, Config),
 3445:                 [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Kate),<<"owner">>},
 3446:                  {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"owner">>}])),
 3447:         escalus:assert_many([is_iq_result, is_presence, is_presence],
 3448:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3)),
 3449: 
 3450:         %% Bob receives his and Kate's notice
 3451:         Preds = [fun(Stanza) ->
 3452:             is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"owner">>) andalso
 3453:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3454:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
 3455:         end,
 3456:         fun(Stanza) ->
 3457:             is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"owner">>) andalso
 3458:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3459:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>), Stanza)
 3460:         end],
 3461:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)),
 3462: 
 3463:         %% Kate receives her and Bob's notice
 3464:         escalus:assert_many(Preds, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 2))
 3465:     end).
 3466: 
 3467: %%  Example 184

 3469: %%  return auth/forbidden according to XEP
 3470: owner_unauthorized(Config) ->
 3471:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(_Alice, Bob) ->
 3472:         %% Bob joins room
 3473:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 3474:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 3475: 
 3476:         %% Bob tries to modify owner list
 3477:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_set_affiliations(
 3478:             ?config(room, Config),
 3479:             [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Bob), <<"owner">>}])),
 3480:         %% Should get an error
 3481:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>],
 3482:             escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
 3483: 
 3484:     end).

 3645:             is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"admin">>) andalso
 3646:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3647:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>), Stanza)
 3648:         end,

 3650:             is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, <<"admin">>) andalso
 3651:             escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(
 3652:                 room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"kate">>), Stanza)
 3653:         end],

 3655:

 3658:     end).

 3662: %%  return auth/forbidden according to XEP

 3665:         %% Bob joins room
 3666:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),

 3680: %%  Examples 201-203
 3681: destroy(Config) ->
 3682:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 3683:         %% Run disco, we should have 1 room
 3684:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_rooms()),
 3685:         count_rooms(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),1),
 3686: 
 3687:         %% Bob joins room
 3688:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)),
 3689:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 3690: 
 3691:         %% Alice requests room destruction
 3692:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_destroy_room(?config(room, Config))),
 3693: 
 3694:         %% Alice gets confirmation
 3695:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 3696: 
 3697:         %% Bob gets unavailable presence
 3698:         Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3699:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>], Presence),
 3700:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from,
 3701:           [room_address(?config(room, Config), <<"bob">>)], Presence),
 3702: 
 3703: 
 3704:         %% Run disco again, we should have no rooms
 3705:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_rooms()),
 3706:         count_rooms(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),0)
 3707:     end).
 3708: 
 3709: %%  Example 204
 3710: %%  Test doesn't fail anymore
 3711: %%  Ejabberd used to return forbidden error without a type attribute
 3712: destroy_unauthorized(Config) ->
 3713:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 3714:         %% Run disco, we should have 1 room
 3715:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_rooms()),
 3716:         count_rooms(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),1),
 3717: 
 3718:         %% Bob tries to destroy Alice's room
 3719:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_destroy_room(?config(room, Config))),
 3720: 
 3721:         %% Bob gets an error
 3722:         Error = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 3723:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [room_address(?config(room, Config))], Error),
 3724:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Error),
 3725: 
 3726:         %% Run disco again, we still should have 1 room
 3727:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_get_rooms()),
 3728:         count_rooms(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),1)
 3729:     end).
 3730: 
 3731: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3732: %% RSM (a partial list of rooms)
 3733: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3734: 
 3735: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 3736:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3737:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 3738:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 3739:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_room_list_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 3740:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 3741:         end,
 3742:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3743: 
 3744: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 3745:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3746:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 3747:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 3748:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_room_list_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 3749:         wait_room_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 3750:         ok
 3751:         end,
 3752:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3753: 
 3754: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 3755:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3756:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 3757:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 3758:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_room_list_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 3759:         wait_room_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 3760:         ok
 3761:         end,
 3762:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3763: 
 3764: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 3765:     %% The last item in the page returned by the responding entity
 3766:     %% MUST be the item that immediately preceeds the item that
 3767:     %% the requesting entity indicated it has already received.
 3768:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3769:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 3770:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=generate_room_name(10)},
 3771:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_room_list_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 3772:         wait_room_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 3773:         ok
 3774:         end,
 3775:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3776: 
 3777: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 3778:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3779:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 3780:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after',
 3781:                       id=generate_room_name(10)},
 3782:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_room_list_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 3783:         wait_room_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 3784:         ok
 3785:         end,
 3786:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3787: 
 3788: %% @doc Based on examples from http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0059.html
 3789: %% @end
 3790: %% <iq type='get' from='stpeter@jabber.org/roundabout'
 3791: %%       to='conference.jabber.org' id='ex2'>
 3792: %%   <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'>
 3793: %%     <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 3794: %%       <max>20</max>
 3795: %%     </set>
 3796: %%   </query>
 3797: %% </iq>
 3798: stanza_room_list_request(_QueryId, RSM) ->
 3799:     escalus_stanza:iq(?MUC_HOST, <<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 3800:         name = <<"query">>,
 3801:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,
 3802:                   <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items">>}],
 3803:         children = skip_undefined([maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 3804:     }]).
 3805: 
 3806: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 3807:     undefined;
 3808: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 3809:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 3810:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 3811:            children = skip_undefined([
 3812:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 3813:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 3814:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 3815: 
 3816: rsm_id_children(undefined) -> [];
 3817: rsm_id_children(Id) -> [#xmlcdata{content = Id}].
 3818: 
 3819: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 3820:     undefined;
 3821: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 3822:     #xmlel{
 3823:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 3824:         children = rsm_id_children(Id)}.
 3825: 
 3826: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 3827:     undefined;
 3828: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 3829:     #xmlel{
 3830:         name = <<"index">>,
 3831:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}]}.
 3832: 
 3833: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 3834:     undefined;
 3835: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 3836:     #xmlel{
 3837:         name = <<"max">>,
 3838:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}]}.
 3839: 
 3840: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 3841:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 3842: 
 3843: i2b(X) when is_integer(X) ->
 3844:     list_to_binary(integer_to_list(X)).
 3845: 
 3846: wait_room_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 3847:     wait_room_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 3848: 
 3849: wait_room_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 3850:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Client),
 3851:     Out = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 3852:     try
 3853:         ?assert_equal(i2b(TotalCount),           Out#rsm_out.count),
 3854:         ?assert_equal(i2b(Offset),               Out#rsm_out.index),
 3855:         ?assert_equal(generate_room_name(FromN), Out#rsm_out.first),
 3856:         ?assert_equal(generate_room_name(ToN),   Out#rsm_out.last),
 3857:         ?assert_equal(generate_room_addrs(FromN, ToN), room_jids(Out)),
 3858:         ok
 3859:     catch Class:Reason ->
 3860:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 3861:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~nOut: ~p~n", [IQ, Out]),
 3862:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 3863:     end.
 3864: 
 3865: wait_empty_rset(Client, TotalCount) ->
 3866:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Client),
 3867:     Out = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 3868:     try
 3869:         ?assert_equal(i2b(TotalCount), Out#rsm_out.count),
 3870:         ?assert_equal([], room_jids(Out)),
 3871:         ok
 3872:     catch Class:Reason ->
 3873:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 3874:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~nOut: ~p~n", [IQ, Out]),
 3875:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 3876:     end.
 3877: 
 3878: room_jids(#rsm_out{items=Items}) ->
 3879:     [exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>) || Item <- Items].
 3880: 
 3881: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = [Query]}) ->
 3882:     parse_result_query(Query).
 3883: 
 3884: parse_result_query(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children}) ->
 3885:     %% rot1
 3886:     [Set|Items_r] = lists:reverse(Children),
 3887:     Items = lists:reverse(Items_r),
 3888:     First = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 3889:     Index = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>},
 3890:                                   {attr, <<"index">>}]),
 3891:     Last  = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 3892:     Count = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]),
 3893:     #rsm_out{items = Items,
 3894:              first = First,
 3895:              index = Index,
 3896:              last = Last,
 3897:              count = Count}.
 3898: 
 3899: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3900: %% Helpers
 3901: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3902: 
 3903: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 3904: 
 3905: populate_room_with_users(Users, Config) ->
 3906:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 3907:     lists:foldl(fun(User, AlreadyInRoom) ->
 3908:             enter_room(Room, User, AlreadyInRoom),
 3909:             [User | AlreadyInRoom]
 3910:         end, [], Users).
 3911: 
 3912: enter_room(Room, User, AlreadyInRoom) ->
 3913:     EnterRoomStanza = stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, escalus_utils:get_username(User)),
 3914:     escalus:send(User, EnterRoomStanza),
 3915: 
 3916:     lists:foreach(fun(UserInRoom) ->
 3917:             % for every user in the room, receive presence
 3918:             is_presence_with_affiliation(escalus:wait_for_stanza(User), <<"none">>),
 3919:             % every user in the room receives presence from User
 3920:             Pres = escalus:wait_for_stanza(UserInRoom),
 3921:             is_presence_with_affiliation(Pres, <<"none">>),
 3922:             is_presence_from(User, Room, Pres)
 3923:         end,
 3924:         AlreadyInRoom),
 3925: 
 3926:     Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User),
 3927:     is_presence_with_affiliation(Presence, <<"none">>),
 3928:     is_self_presence(User, Room, Presence),
 3929:     is_subject_message(escalus:wait_for_stanza(User)).
 3930: 
 3931: is_history_message_correct(Room, SenderNick,Type,  Text, ReceivedMessage) ->
 3932:     %error_logger:info_msg("tested message: ~n~p~n", [ReceivedMessage]),
 3933:     escalus_pred:is_message(ReceivedMessage),
 3934: 	exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"delay">>}, {attr, <<"stamp">>}]),
 3935: 	FromDelay = room_address(Room),
 3936: 	FromDelay = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"delay">>}, {attr, <<"from">>}]),
 3937:     From = room_address(Room, SenderNick),
 3938:     From = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>),
 3939:     Type = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"type">>),
 3940: 	Content = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"body">>}, cdata]),
 3941: 	Text = Content.
 3942: 
 3943: is_non_anonymous_history_message_correct(Room, SenderNick,Type,  Text, ReceivedMessage) ->
 3944:     %error_logger:info_msg("tested message: ~n~p~n", [ReceivedMessage]),
 3945:     escalus_pred:is_message(ReceivedMessage),
 3946: 	exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"delay">>}, {attr, <<"stamp">>}]),
 3947: 	FromDelay = room_address(Room),
 3948: 	FromDelay = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"delay">>}, {attr, <<"from">>}]),
 3949:     From = room_address(Room, SenderNick),
 3950:     From = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>),
 3951:     Type = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"type">>),
 3952: 	Content = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"body">>}, cdata]),
 3953: 	Text = Content,
 3954: 	<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/address">> = exml:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"addresses">>}, {attr, <<"xmlns">>}]),
 3955: 	<<"oform">> = exml:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"addresses">>},{element, <<"address">>}, {attr, <<"type">>}]),
 3956: 	JID = escalus_utils:get_jid(SenderNick),
 3957: 	JID= exml:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"addresses">>},{element, <<"address">>}, {attr, <<"jid">>}]).
 3958: 
 3959: is_self_presence(User, Room, Presence) ->
 3960: 		has_status_codes(Presence, [<<"110">>]),
 3961:         escalus_pred:is_presence(Presence),
 3962: 		From = room_address(Room, escalus_utils:get_username(User)),
 3963:         From = exml_query:attr(Presence, <<"from">>).
 3964: 
 3965: is_presence_from(User, Room, Presence) ->
 3966:         escalus_pred:is_presence(Presence),
 3967: 		From = room_address(Room, escalus_utils:get_username(User)),
 3968:         From = exml_query:attr(Presence, <<"from">>).
 3969: 
 3970: 
 3971: %does not check the jid - the user might not be entitled to receive it.
 3972: is_availability_status_notification_correct(Room, SenderNick, NewStatus, ReceivedMessage) ->
 3973:     escalus_pred:is_presence(ReceivedMessage),
 3974:     From = room_address(Room, SenderNick),
 3975:     From  = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>),
 3976:     NewStatus =  exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"status">>}, cdata]),
 3977:     <<"xa">> = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"show">>}, cdata]).
 3978: 
 3979: is_item_list_empty(#xmlel{children = [Query]}) ->
 3980:     Query#xmlel.children == [].
 3981: 
 3982: assert_is_message_correct(Room, SenderNick, Type, Text, ReceivedMessage) ->
 3983:     escalus_pred:is_message(ReceivedMessage),
 3984:     From = room_address(Room, SenderNick),
 3985:     From  = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>),
 3986:     Type  = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"type">>),
 3987:     Body = #xmlel{name = <<"body">>, children = [#xmlcdata{content=Text}]},
 3988:     Body = exml_query:subelement(ReceivedMessage, <<"body">>).
 3989: 
 3990: assert_is_exit_message_correct(LeavingUser,Affiliation,Room, Message) ->
 3991: 	escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"unavailable">>,Message),
 3992: 	is_presence_with_affiliation(Message,Affiliation),
 3993:     From = room_address(Room, escalus_utils:get_username(LeavingUser)),
 3994:     From  = exml_query:attr(Message, <<"from">>).
 3995: 
 3996: is_exit_message_with_status_correct(LeavingUser,Affiliation,Room,Status,  Message) ->
 3997: 	escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"unavailable">>,Message),
 3998: 	is_presence_with_affiliation(Message,Affiliation),
 3999:     From = room_address(Room, escalus_utils:get_username(LeavingUser)),
 4000:     From  = exml_query:attr(Message, <<"from">>),
 4001: 	Status = exml_query:path(Message, [{element,<<"status">>}, cdata]).
 4002: 
 4003: is_nick_unavailable_correct(Room, OldNick, NewNick, ReceivedMessage) ->
 4004:      %error_logger:info_msg("tested message: ~n~p~n", [ReceivedMessage]),
 4005:     escalus_pred:is_message(ReceivedMessage),
 4006:     From = room_address(Room, OldNick),
 4007:     From = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>),
 4008:     has_status_codes(ReceivedMessage, [<<"303">>]),
 4009:     NewNick = exml_query:path(ReceivedMessage, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"item">>},{attr, <<"nick">>}]).
 4010: 
 4011: is_nick_update_correct(Room,NewNick, ReceivedMessage) ->
 4012:     %error_logger:info_msg("tested message: ~n~p~n", [ReceivedMessage]),
 4013:     escalus_pred:is_message(ReceivedMessage),
 4014:     From = room_address(Room,NewNick),
 4015:     From  = exml_query:attr(ReceivedMessage, <<"from">>).
 4016: 
 4017: print_next_message(User) ->
 4018:     error_logger:info_msg("~p messaege, ~n~p~n", [User, escalus:wait_for_stanza(User)]).
 4019: 
 4020: print(Element) ->
 4021:     error_logger:info_msg("~n~p~n", [Element]).
 4022: 
 4023: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 4024:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 4025:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 4026:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 4027:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 4028:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 4029: 
 4030: %Groupchat 1.0 protocol
 4031: stanza_groupchat_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 4032:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>), Room, Nick).
 4033: 
 4034: 
 4035: stanza_groupchat_enter_room_no_nick(Room) ->
 4036:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>), Room).
 4037: 
 4038: 
 4039: %Basic MUC protocol
 4040: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 4041:     stanza_to_room(
 4042:         escalus_stanza:presence(  <<"available">>,
 4043:                                 [#xmlel{ name = <<"x">>, attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>}]}]),
 4044:         Room, Nick).
 4045: 
 4046: stanza_muc_enter_password_protected_room(Room, Nick, Password) ->
 4047:     stanza_to_room(
 4048:         escalus_stanza:presence(  <<"available">>,
 4049:                                 [#xmlel{ name = <<"x">>, attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>}],
 4050:                                              children=[#xmlel{name = <<"password">>, children = [#xmlcdata{content=[Password]}]} ]}]),
 4051:         Room, Nick).
 4052: 
 4053: stanza_change_nick(Room, NewNick) ->
 4054:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>), Room, NewNick).
 4055: 
 4056: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 4057:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 4058:     create_instant_room(<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts),
 4059:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 4060: 
 4061: create_instant_room(Host, Room, From, Nick, Opts) ->
 4062:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 4063:         [Host, Room, From, Nick, Opts]).
 4064: 
 4065: start_rsm_rooms(Config, User, Nick) ->
 4066:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 4067:     [create_instant_room(
 4068:             <<"localhost">>, generate_room_name(N), From, Nick, [])
 4069:      || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 4070:     Config.
 4071: 
 4072: destroy_rsm_rooms(Config) ->
 4073:     [destroy_room(?MUC_HOST, generate_room_name(N))
 4074:      || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 4075:     Config.
 4076: 
 4077: generate_room_name(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 4078:     list_to_binary(io_lib:format("room~2..0B", [N])).
 4079: 
 4080: generate_room_addr(N) ->
 4081:     room_address(generate_room_name(N)).
 4082: 
 4083: generate_room_addrs(FromN, ToN) ->
 4084:     [generate_room_addr(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)].
 4085: 
 4086: destroy_room(Config) ->
 4087:     destroy_room(?MUC_HOST, ?config(room, Config)).
 4088: 
 4089: destroy_room(Host, Room) when is_binary(Host), is_binary(Room) ->
 4090:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(
 4091:             ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {Room, Host}]) of
 4092:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 4093:         _ -> ok
 4094:     end.
 4095: 
 4096: room_address(Room) ->
 4097:     <<Room/binary, "@", ?MUC_HOST/binary>>.
 4098: 
 4099: room_address(Room, Nick) ->
 4100:     <<Room/binary, "@", ?MUC_HOST/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 4101: 
 4102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4103: %% Helpers (stanzas)
 4104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4105: 
 4106: stanza_message_to_room(Room, Payload) ->
 4107:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>, children = Payload}, Room).
 4108: 
 4109: stanza_change_availability(NewStatus, Room, Nick) ->
 4110:     stanza_to_room(
 4111:         escalus_stanza:presence( <<"available">>,
 4112:                                 [
 4113:                                 #xmlel{ name = <<"show">>, children=[ #xmlcdata{content=[<<"xa">>]}]},
 4114:                                 #xmlel{ name = <<"status">>, children=[ #xmlcdata{content=[NewStatus]}]}
 4115:                                 ]),
 4116:         Room, Nick).
 4117: 
 4118: stanza_muc_enter_room_history_setting(Room, Nick, Setting, Value) ->
 4119:     stanza_to_room(
 4120:         escalus_stanza:presence(  <<"available">>,
 4121:                                 [#xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 4122:                     						  attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>}],
 4123: 											  children = [#xmlel{name= <<"history">>, attrs=[{Setting, Value}]}]}]),
 4124:         Room, Nick).
 4125: 
 4126: stanza_room_subject(Room, Subject) ->
 4127:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 4128:         attrs = [{<<"type">>,<<"groupchat">>}],
 4129:         children = [#xmlel{
 4130:             name = <<"subject">>,
 4131:             children = [exml:escape_cdata(Subject)]
 4132:         }]
 4133:     }, Room).
 4134: 
 4135: stanza_mediated_invitation(Room, Invited) ->
 4136:     stanza_mediated_invitation_multi(Room, [Invited]).
 4137: 
 4138: stanza_mediated_invitation_multi(Room, AllInvited) ->
 4139:     Payload = [ #xmlel{name = <<"invite">>,
 4140: 		       attrs = [{<<"to">>, escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Invited)}]}
 4141: 		|| Invited <- AllInvited],
 4142:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 4143:         children = [ #xmlel{
 4144:             name = <<"x">>,
 4145:             attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ?NS_MUC_USER}],
 4146:             children = Payload }
 4147:         ]}, Room).
 4148: 
 4149: stanza_mediated_invitation_decline(Room,Sender) ->
 4150:     Payload = [ #xmlel{name = <<"decline">>,
 4151:         attrs = [{<<"to">>, escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Sender)}]} ],
 4152:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 4153:         children = [ #xmlel{
 4154:             name = <<"x">>,
 4155:             attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ?NS_MUC_USER}],
 4156:             children = Payload }
 4157:         ]}, Room).
 4158: 
 4159: stanza_set_roles(Room, List) ->
 4160:     Payload = lists:map(fun({Nick, Role}) ->
 4161:         #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4162:         attrs = [{<<"nick">>, Nick}, {<<"role">>, Role}]};
 4163:     ({Nick, Role, Reason}) ->
 4164:         #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4165:         attrs = [{<<"nick">>, Nick}, {<<"role">>, Role}],
 4166:         children = [#xmlel{
 4167:             name = <<"reason">>,
 4168:             children = [#xmlcdata{content = Reason}]}
 4169:         ]}
 4170:     end, List),
 4171:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_MUC_ADMIN, Payload), Room).
 4172: 
 4173: stanza_set_affiliations(Room, List) ->
 4174:     Payload = lists:map(fun({JID, Affiliation}) ->
 4175:         #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4176:         attrs = [{<<"jid">>, JID}, {<<"affiliation">>, Affiliation}]};
 4177:     ({JID, Affiliation, Reason}) ->
 4178:         #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4179:         attrs = [{<<"jid">>, JID}, {<<"affiliation">>, Affiliation}],
 4180:         children = [#xmlel{
 4181:             name = <<"reason">>,
 4182:             children = [#xmlcdata{content = Reason}]}
 4183:         ]}
 4184:     end, List),
 4185:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_MUC_ADMIN, Payload), Room).
 4186: 
 4187: stanza_role_list_request(Room, Role) ->
 4188:     Payload = [ #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4189:         attrs = [{<<"role">>, Role}]} ],
 4190:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_ADMIN, Payload), Room).
 4191: 
 4192: stanza_form_request(Room) ->
 4193:     Payload = [],
 4194:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_OWNER, Payload), Room).
 4195: 
 4196: stanza_affiliation_list_request(Room, Affiliation) ->
 4197:     Payload = [ #xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
 4198:         attrs = [{<<"affiliation">>, Affiliation}]} ],
 4199:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_ADMIN, Payload), Room).
 4200: 
 4201: stanza_ban_list_request(Room) ->
 4202:     stanza_affiliation_list_request(Room, <<"outcast">>).
 4203: 
 4204: stanza_ban_user(User, Room) ->
 4205:   stanza_set_affiliations(Room, [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User), <<"outcast">>}]).
 4206: 
 4207: stanza_ban_user(User, Room, Reason) ->
 4208:   stanza_set_affiliations(Room, [{escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User), <<"outcast">>, Reason}]).
 4209: 
 4210: stanza_join_room(Room, Nick) ->
 4211:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"presence">>, children =
 4212:         [#xmlel{
 4213:             name = <<"x">>,
 4214:             attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>}]
 4215:         }]
 4216:     },Room, Nick).
 4217: 
 4218: %% stanza with multiple x subelements - empathy send additional x's
 4219: stanza_join_room_many_x_elements(Room, Nick) ->
 4220:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"presence">>, children =
 4221:                           [#xmlel{
 4222:                               name = <<"x">>,
 4223:                               attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"vcard-temp:x:update">>}]
 4224:                              },
 4225:                            #xmlel{
 4226:                               name = <<"x">>,
 4227:                               attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>}]
 4228:                              }]
 4229:                          }, Room, Nick).
 4230: 
 4231: stanza_voice_request_form(Room) ->
 4232:     Payload = [ form_field({<<"muc#role">>, <<"participant">>, <<"text-single">>}) ],
 4233:     stanza_message_to_room(Room, [stanza_form(Payload, ?NS_MUC_REQUEST)]).
 4234: 
 4235: stanza_voice_request_approval(Room, JID, Nick) ->
 4236:     Items = [{<<"muc#role">>, <<"participant">>, <<"text-single">>},
 4237:         {<<"muc#jid">>, JID, <<"jid-single">>},
 4238:         {<<"muc#roomnick">>, Nick, <<"text-single">>},
 4239:         {<<"muc#request_allow">>, <<"true">>, <<"boolean">>}],
 4240:     Payload = [ form_field(El) || El <- Items],
 4241:     stanza_message_to_room(Room, [stanza_form(Payload, ?NS_MUC_REQUEST)]).
 4242: 
 4243: stanza_voice_request_approval_nonick(Room, JID) ->
 4244:     Items = [{<<"muc#role">>, <<"participant">>, <<"text-single">>},
 4245:         {<<"muc#jid">>, JID, <<"jid-single">>},
 4246:         {<<"muc#request_allow">>, <<"true">>, <<"boolean">>}],
 4247:     Payload = [ form_field(El) || El <- Items],
 4248:     stanza_message_to_room(Room, [stanza_form(Payload, ?NS_MUC_REQUEST)]).
 4249: 
 4250: stanza_configuration_form(Room, Params) ->
 4251:     DefaultParams = [],
 4252:     FinalParams = lists:foldl(
 4253:         fun({Key,_Val,_Type},Acc) ->
 4254:             lists:keydelete(Key,1,Acc)
 4255:         end,
 4256:         DefaultParams, Params) ++ Params,
 4257:     Payload = [ form_field(FieldData) || FieldData <- FinalParams ],
 4258:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(
 4259:           ?NS_MUC_OWNER, [stanza_form(Payload, ?NS_MUC_ROOMCONFIG)]), Room).
 4260: 
 4261: stanza_cancel(Room) ->
 4262:     Payload = [#xmlel{
 4263:         name = <<"x">>,
 4264:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"jabber:x:data">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"cancel">>}]
 4265:     }],
 4266:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(
 4267:           ?NS_MUC_OWNER, Payload), Room).
 4268: 
 4269: stanza_form(Payload, Type) ->
 4270:     #xmlel{
 4271:         name = <<"x">>,
 4272:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"jabber:x:data">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"submit">>}],
 4273:         children = [form_field({<<"FORM_TYPE">>, Type, <<"hidden">>}) | Payload]
 4274:     }.
 4275: 
 4276: form_field_item(Value) ->
 4277:     #xmlel{ name  = <<"value">>,
 4278:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = Value}]}.
 4279: 
 4280: form_field({Var, Value, Type}) when is_list(Value) ->
 4281:     #xmlel{ name  = <<"field">>,
 4282:         attrs = [{<<"var">>, Var},{<<"type">>, Type}],
 4283:         children  = [form_field_item(V) || V <- Value]};
 4284: form_field({Var, Value, Type}) ->
 4285:     #xmlel{ name  = <<"field">>,
 4286:                  attrs = [{<<"type">>, Type},{<<"var">>, Var}],
 4287:                  children  = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 4288:                                           children = [#xmlcdata{content = Value}] }] }.
 4289: 
 4290: stanza_instant_room(Room) ->
 4291:     X = #xmlel{name = <<"x">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ?NS_DATA_FORMS},
 4292:                                              {<<"type">>, <<"submit">>}]},
 4293:     escalus_stanza:to(escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_MUC_OWNER, [X]), Room).
 4294: 
 4295: stanza_reserved_room(Room) ->
 4296:     escalus_stanza:to(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_MUC_OWNER, []), Room).
 4297: 
 4298: stanza_destroy_room(Room) ->
 4299:     Payload = [ #xmlel{name = <<"destroy">>} ],
 4300:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_MUC_OWNER, Payload), Room).
 4301: 
 4302: stanza_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 4303:     stanza_to_room(#xmlel{name = <<"presence">>}, Room, Nick).
 4304: 
 4305: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 4306:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 4307: 
 4308: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 4309:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 4310: 
 4311: stanza_get_rooms() ->
 4312:     %% <iq from='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4313:     %%   id='zb8q41f4'
 4314:     %%   to='chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4315:     %%   type='get'>
 4316:     %% <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'/>
 4317:     %% </iq>
 4318:     escalus_stanza:setattr(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_ITEMS, []), <<"to">>,
 4319:         ?MUC_HOST).
 4320: 
 4321: stanza_get_features() ->
 4322:     %% <iq from='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4323:     %%     id='lx09df27'
 4324:     %%     to='chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4325:     %%     type='get'>
 4326:     %%  <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info'/>
 4327:     %% </iq>
 4328:     escalus_stanza:setattr(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_INFO, []), <<"to">>,
 4329:         ?MUC_HOST).
 4330: 
 4331: stanza_get_services(Config) ->
 4332:     %% <iq from='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4333:     %%     id='h7ns81g'
 4334:     %%     to='shakespeare.lit'
 4335:     %%     type='get'>
 4336:     %%   <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'/>
 4337:     %% </iq>
 4338:     escalus_stanza:setattr(escalus_stanza:iq_get(?NS_DISCO_ITEMS, []), <<"to">>,
 4339:         escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config)).
 4340: 
 4341: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4342: %% Helpers (assertions)
 4343: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4344: 
 4345: invite_has_reason(Stanza) ->
 4346:     exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"reason">>}, cdata]) =/= undefined.
 4347: 
 4348: has_reason(Stanza) ->
 4349:     exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"item">>},
 4350:         {element, <<"reason">>}]) =/= undefined.
 4351: 
 4352: is_message_form(Stanza) ->
 4353:     exml_query:path(Stanza,[{element,<<"x">>},
 4354:         {attr, <<"xmlns">>}]) =:= ?NS_DATA_FORMS.
 4355: 
 4356: is_form(Stanza) ->
 4357:     exml_query:path(Stanza,[{element, <<"query">>}, {element,<<"x">>},
 4358:         {attr, <<"xmlns">>}]) =:= ?NS_DATA_FORMS.
 4359: 
 4360: is_groupchat_message(Stanza) ->
 4361:     escalus_pred:is_message(Stanza) andalso
 4362:     escalus_pred:has_type(<<"groupchat">>, Stanza).
 4363: 
 4364: is_subject_message(Stanza) ->
 4365:     is_groupchat_message(Stanza) andalso
 4366:     exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"subject">>) /= undefined.
 4367: 
 4368: is_subject_message(Stanza, Subject) ->
 4369:     is_groupchat_message(Stanza) andalso
 4370:     exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element,<<"subject">>},cdata]) == Subject.
 4371: 
 4372: is_unavailable_presence(Stanza, Status) ->
 4373:     escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"unavailable">>,Stanza) andalso
 4374:     is_presence_with_status_code(Stanza, Status).
 4375: 
 4376: is_membership_presence(Stanza, Affiliation, Role) ->
 4377:     is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, Affiliation) andalso
 4378:     is_presence_with_role(Stanza, Role).
 4379: 
 4380: is_invitation(Stanza) ->
 4381:     escalus:assert(is_message, Stanza),
 4382:     #xmlel{} = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"invite">>}]).
 4383: 
 4384: is_invitation_decline(Stanza) ->
 4385:     escalus:assert(is_message, Stanza),
 4386:     #xmlel{} = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"decline">>}]).
 4387: 
 4388: is_presence_with_role(Stanza, Role) ->
 4389:     is_with_role(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"x">>), Role).
 4390: 
 4391: is_iq_with_role(Stanza, Role) ->
 4392:     is_with_role(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"query">>), Role).
 4393: 
 4394: is_with_role(Stanza, Role) ->
 4395:     Items = exml_query:subelements(Stanza, <<"item">>),
 4396:     lists:any(fun(Item) ->
 4397:         exml_query:attr(Item, <<"role">>) =:= Role
 4398:     end, Items).
 4399: 
 4400: is_presence_with_nick(Stanza, Nick) ->
 4401:     escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza) andalso
 4402:     exml_query:path(Stanza,[{element, <<"x">>},
 4403:         {element, <<"item">>}, {attribute, <<"nick">>}]) == Nick.
 4404: 
 4405: is_presence_with_affiliation(Stanza, Affiliation) ->
 4406:     is_affiliation(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"x">>), Affiliation).
 4407: 
 4408: is_iq_with_affiliation(Stanza, Affiliation) ->
 4409:     is_affiliation(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"query">>), Affiliation).
 4410: 
 4411: is_affiliation(Stanza, Affiliation) ->
 4412:     Items = exml_query:subelements(Stanza, <<"item">>),
 4413:     lists:any(fun(Item) ->
 4414:         exml_query:attr(Item, <<"affiliation">>) =:= Affiliation
 4415:     end, Items).
 4416: 
 4417: is_presence_with_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4418:     is_jid(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"x">>), User).
 4419: 
 4420: is_presence_with_full_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4421:     is_full_jid(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"x">>), User).
 4422: 
 4423: is_iq_with_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4424:     is_jid(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"query">>), User).
 4425: 
 4426: is_full_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4427:     Item = exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"item">>),
 4428:     JID = escalus_utils:get_jid(User),
 4429:     JID = exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>).
 4430: 
 4431: is_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4432:     Items = exml_query:subelements(Stanza, <<"item">>),
 4433:     JID = escalus_utils:get_jid(User),
 4434:     lists:any(fun(Item) -> exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>) =:= JID end, Items).
 4435: 
 4436: is_presence_with_short_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4437:     is_short_jid(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"x">>), User).
 4438: 
 4439: is_iq_with_short_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4440:     is_short_jid(exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"query">>), User).
 4441: 
 4442: is_short_jid(Stanza, User) ->
 4443:     Items = exml_query:subelements(Stanza, <<"item">>),
 4444:     JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User)),
 4445:     lists:any(fun(Item) -> escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>)) =:= JID end, Items).
 4446: 
 4447: is_presence_with_status_code(Presence, Code) ->
 4448:     escalus:assert(is_presence, Presence),
 4449:     Code == exml_query:path(Presence, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"status">>},
 4450:         {attr, <<"code">>}]).
 4451: 
 4452: is_message_with_status_code(Message, Code) ->
 4453:     escalus_pred:is_message(Message) andalso
 4454:     Code == exml_query:path(Message, [{element, <<"x">>}, {element, <<"status">>},
 4455:         {attr, <<"code">>}]).
 4456: 
 4457: has_status_codes(Stanza, CodeList) ->
 4458:     StatusList = exml_query:paths(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>},{element, <<"status">>}]),
 4459:     StanzaCodes = lists:map(fun(Status) ->
 4460:                     exml_query:attr(Status, <<"code">>)
 4461:         end, StatusList),
 4462:     true = lists:all(fun (Code) ->
 4463:                         lists:member(Code, StanzaCodes)
 4464:             end, CodeList).
 4465: 
 4466: 
 4467: has_feature(Stanza, Feature) ->
 4468:     Features = exml_query:paths(Stanza, [{element, <<"query">>},
 4469:                                          {element, <<"feature">>}]),
 4470:     true = lists:any(fun(Item) ->
 4471:                         exml_query:attr(Item, <<"var">>) == Feature
 4472:                      end,
 4473:                      Features).
 4474: 
 4475: was_destroy_presented(#xmlel{children = [Items]} = Presence) ->
 4476:     #xmlel{} = exml_query:subelement(Items, <<"destroy">>),
 4477:     <<"unavailable">> = exml_query:attr(Presence, <<"type">>).
 4478: 
 4479: was_room_destroyed(Query) ->
 4480:     timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
 4481:     <<"result">> = exml_query:attr(Query, <<"type">>).
 4482: 
 4483: was_room_created(Stanza) ->
 4484:     timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
 4485:     has_status_codes(Stanza, [<<"201">>, <<"110">>]),
 4486:     [<<"owner">>] = exml_query:paths(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>},
 4487:                                               {element, <<"item">>},
 4488:                                               {attr, <<"affiliation">>}]),
 4489:     [<<"moderator">>] = exml_query:paths(Stanza, [{element, <<"x">>},
 4490:                                                   {element, <<"item">>},
 4491:                                                   {attr, <<"role">>}]).
 4492: 
 4493: has_room(JID, #xmlel{children = [ #xmlel{children = Rooms} ]}) ->
 4494:     %% <iq from='chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4495:     %%   id='zb8q41f4'
 4496:     %%   to='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4497:     %%   type='result'>
 4498:     %% <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'>
 4499:     %%    <item jid='heath@chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4500:     %%         name='A Lonely Heath'/>
 4501:     %%    <item jid='coven@chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4502:     %%         name='A Dark Cave'/>
 4503:     %%    <item jid='forres@chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4504:     %%         name='The Palace'/>
 4505:     %%     <item jid='inverness@chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4506:     %%         name='Macbeth&apos;s Castle'/>
 4507:     %%   </query>
 4508:     %% </iq>
 4509: 
 4510:     RoomPred = fun(Item) ->
 4511:         exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>) == JID
 4512:     end,
 4513:     true = lists:any(RoomPred, Rooms).
 4514: 
 4515: count_rooms(#xmlel{children = [ #xmlel{children = Rooms} ]}, N) ->
 4516:     ?assert_equal(N, length(Rooms)).
 4517: 
 4518: has_features(#xmlel{children = [ Query ]}) ->
 4519:     %%<iq from='chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4520:     %%  id='lx09df27'
 4521:     %%  to='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4522:     %%  type='result'>
 4523:     %%  <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info'>
 4524:     %%    <identity
 4525:     %%      category='conference'
 4526:     %%      name='Shakespearean Chat Service'
 4527:     %%      type='text'/>
 4528:     %%      <feature var='http://jabber.org/protocol/muc'/>
 4529:     %%  </query>
 4530:     %%</iq>
 4531: 
 4532:     Identity = exml_query:subelement(Query, <<"identity">>),
 4533:     <<"conference">> = exml_query:attr(Identity, <<"category">>),
 4534:     #xmlel{name = _Name, attrs = _Attrs, children = _Body} = exml_query:subelement(Query, <<"feature">>).
 4535: 
 4536: has_muc(#xmlel{children = [ #xmlel{children = Services} ]}) ->
 4537:     %% should be along the lines of (taken straight from the XEP):
 4538:     %% <iq from='shakespeare.lit'
 4539:     %%     id='h7ns81g'
 4540:     %%     to='hag66@shakespeare.lit/pda'
 4541:     %%     type='result'>
 4542:     %%   <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'>
 4543:     %%     <item jid='chat.shakespeare.lit'
 4544:     %%           name='Chatroom Service'/>
 4545:     %%   </query>
 4546:     %% </iq>
 4547: 
 4548:     %% is like this:
 4549:     %% {xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 4550:     %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"localhost">>},
 4551:     %%         {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 4552:     %%         {<<"id">>,<<"a5eb1dc70826598893b15f1936b18a34">>},
 4553:     %%         {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 4554:     %%     [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 4555:     %%             [{<<"xmlns">>,
 4556:     %%                     <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items">>}],
 4557:     %%             [{xmlel,<<"item">>,
 4558:     %%                     [{<<"jid">>,<<"vjud.localhost">>}],
 4559:     %%                     []},
 4560:     %%                 {xmlel,<<"item">>,
 4561:     %%                     [{<<"jid">>,<<"pubsub.localhost">>}],
 4562:     %%                     []},
 4563:     %%                 {xmlel,<<"item">>,
 4564:     %%                     [{<<"jid">>,<<"muc.localhost">>}],
 4565:     %%                     []},
 4566:     %%                 {xmlel,<<"item">>,
 4567:     %%                     [{<<"jid">>,<<"irc.localhost">>}],
 4568:     %%                     []}]}]}
 4569:     %% how to obtaing output like the above? simply put this in the test case:
 4570:     %% S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 4571:     %% error_logger:info_msg("~p~n", [S]),
 4572:     IsMUC = fun(Item) ->
 4573:         exml_query:attr(Item, <<"jid">>) == ?MUC_HOST
 4574:     end,
 4575:     lists:any(IsMUC, Services).
 4576: 
 4577: is_room_locked(Stanza) ->
 4578:     escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza)
 4579:     andalso
 4580:     escalus_pred:is_error(<<"cancel">>, <<"item-not-found">>, Stanza).
